2329 case CLASS_LOWER6:
2330 for (cu = 1; cu <= 255; cu++)
2331 if (vim_islower(cu))
2332 regc(cu);
2333 break;
2334 case CLASS_PRINT7:
2335 for (cu = 1; cu <= 255; cu++)
2336 if (vim_isprintc(cu))
2337 regc(cu);
2338 break;
2339 case CLASS_PUNCT8:
2340 for (cu = 1; cu <= 255; cu++)
2341 if (ispunct(cu)((*__ctype_b_loc ())[(int) ((cu))] & (unsigned short int)
_ISpunct))
2342 regc(cu);
2343 break;
2344 case CLASS_SPACE9:
2345 for (cu = 9; cu <= 13; cu++)
2346 regc(cu);
2347 regc(' ');
2348 break;
2349 case CLASS_UPPER10:
2350 for (cu = 1; cu <= 255; cu++)
2351 if (vim_isupper(cu))
2352 regc(cu);
2353 break;
2354 case CLASS_XDIGIT11:
2355 for (cu = 1; cu <= 255; cu++)
2356 if (vim_isxdigit(cu))
2357 regc(cu);
2358 break;
2359 case CLASS_TAB12:
2360 regc('\t');
2361 break;
2362 case CLASS_RETURN13:
2363 regc('\r');
2364 break;
2365 case CLASS_BACKSPACE14:
2366 regc('\b');
2367 break;
2368 case CLASS_ESCAPE15:
2369 regc('\033');
2370 break;
2371 }
2372 } else {
2373 if (has_mbyte) {
2374 int len;
2375
2376 /* produce a multibyte character, including any
2377 * following composing characters */
2378 startc = mb_ptr2char(regparse);
2379 len = (*mb_ptr2len)(regparse);
2380 if (enc_utf8 && utf_char2len(startc) != len)
2381 startc = -1; /* composing chars */
2382 while (--len >= 0)
2383 regc(*regparse++);
2384 } else {
2385 startc = *regparse++;
2386 regc(startc);
2387 }
2388 }
2389 }
2390 regc(NUL'\000');
2391 prevchr_len = 1; /* last char was the ']' */
2392 if (*regparse != ']')
2393 EMSG_RET_NULL(_(e_toomsbra))return (emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_toomsbra)))), rc_did_emsg
= 1, (void *)((void*)0)); /* Cannot happen? */
2394 skipchr(); /* let's be friends with the lexer again */
2395 *flagp |= HASWIDTH0x1 | SIMPLE0x2;
2396 break;
2397 } else if (reg_strict)
2398 EMSG2_RET_NULL(_(e_missingbracket), reg_magic > MAGIC_OFF)return (emsg2((char_u *)((gettext((char *)(e_missingbracket))
)), (char_u *)((reg_magic > 2) ? "" : "\\")), rc_did_emsg =
1, (void *)((void*)0));
2399 }
2400 /* FALLTHROUGH */
2401
2402 default:
2403 {
2404 int len;
2405
2406 /* A multi-byte character is handled as a separate atom if it's
2407 * before a multi and when it's a composing char. */
2408 if (use_multibytecode(c)) {
2409do_multibyte:
2410 ret = regnode(MULTIBYTECODE200);
2411 regmbc(c);
2412 *flagp |= HASWIDTH0x1 | SIMPLE0x2;
2413 break;
2414 }
2415
2416 ret = regnode(EXACTLY5);
2417
2418 /*
2419 * Append characters as long as:
2420 * - there is no following multi, we then need the character in
2421 * front of it as a single character operand
2422 * - not running into a Magic character
2423 * - "one_exactly" is not set
2424 * But always emit at least one character. Might be a Multi,
2425 * e.g., a "[" without matching "]".
2426 */
2427 for (len = 0; c != NUL'\000' && (len == 0
2428 || (re_multi_type(peekchr()) == NOT_MULTI0
2429 && !one_exactly
2430 && !is_Magic(c)((c) < 0))); ++len) {
2431 c = no_Magic(c);
2432 if (has_mbyte) {
2433 regmbc(c);
2434 if (enc_utf8) {
2435 int l;
2436
2437 /* Need to get composing character too. */
2438 for (;; ) {
2439 l = utf_ptr2len(regparse);
2440 if (!UTF_COMPOSINGLIKE(regparse, regparse + l)utf_composinglike((regparse), (regparse + l)))
2441 break;
2442 regmbc(utf_ptr2char(regparse));
2443 skipchr();
2444 }
2445 }
2446 } else
2447 regc(c);
2448 c = getchr();
2449 }
2450 ungetchr();
2451
2452 regc(NUL'\000');
2453 *flagp |= HASWIDTH0x1;
2454 if (len == 1)
2455 *flagp |= SIMPLE0x2;
2456 }
2457 break;
2458 }
2459
2460 return ret;
2461}
2462
2463/*
2464 * Return TRUE if MULTIBYTECODE should be used instead of EXACTLY for
2465 * character "c".
2466 */
2467static int use_multibytecode(int c)
2468{
2469 return has_mbyte && (*mb_char2len)(c) > 1
2470 && (re_multi_type(peekchr()) != NOT_MULTI0
2471 || (enc_utf8 && utf_iscomposing(c)));
2472}
2473
2474/*
2475 * Emit a node.
2476 * Return pointer to generated code.
2477 */
2478static char_u *regnode(int op)
2479{
2480 char_u *ret;
2481
2482 ret = regcode;
2483 if (ret == JUST_CALC_SIZE((char_u *) -1))
2484 regsize += 3;
2485 else {
2486 *regcode++ = op;
2487 *regcode++ = NUL'\000'; /* Null "next" pointer. */
2488 *regcode++ = NUL'\000';
2489 }
2490 return ret;
2491}
2492
2493/*
2494 * Emit (if appropriate) a byte of code
2495 */
2496static void regc(int b)
2497{
2498 if (regcode == JUST_CALC_SIZE((char_u *) -1))
2499 regsize++;
2500 else
2501 *regcode++ = b;
2502}
2503
2504/*
2505 * Emit (if appropriate) a multi-byte character of code
2506 */
2507static void regmbc(int c)
2508{
2509 if (!has_mbyte && c > 0xff)
2510 return;
2511 if (regcode == JUST_CALC_SIZE((char_u *) -1))
2512 regsize += (*mb_char2len)(c);
2513 else
2514 regcode += (*mb_char2bytes)(c, regcode);
2515}
2516
2517/*
2518 * Insert an operator in front of already-emitted operand
2519 *
2520 * Means relocating the operand.
2521 */
2522static void reginsert(int op, char_u *opnd)
2523{
2524 char_u *src;
2525 char_u *dst;
2526 char_u *place;
2527
2528 if (regcode == JUST_CALC_SIZE((char_u *) -1)) {
2529 regsize += 3;
2530 return;
2531 }
2532 src = regcode;
2533 regcode += 3;
2534 dst = regcode;
2535 while (src > opnd)
2536 *--dst = *--src;
2537
2538 place = opnd; /* Op node, where operand used to be. */
2539 *place++ = op;
2540 *place++ = NUL'\000';
2541 *place = NUL'\000';
2542}
2543
2544/*
2545 * Insert an operator in front of already-emitted operand.
2546 * Add a number to the operator.
2547 */
2548static void reginsert_nr(int op, long val, char_u *opnd)
2549{
2550 char_u *src;
2551 char_u *dst;
2552 char_u *place;
2553
2554 if (regcode == JUST_CALC_SIZE((char_u *) -1)) {
2555 regsize += 7;
2556 return;
2557 }
2558 src = regcode;
2559 regcode += 7;
2560 dst = regcode;
2561 while (src > opnd)
2562 *--dst = *--src;
2563
2564 place = opnd; /* Op node, where operand used to be. */
2565 *place++ = op;
2566 *place++ = NUL'\000';
2567 *place++ = NUL'\000';
2568 re_put_long(place, (long_u)val);
2569}
2570
2571/*
2572 * Insert an operator in front of already-emitted operand.
2573 * The operator has the given limit values as operands. Also set next pointer.
2574 *
2575 * Means relocating the operand.
2576 */
2577static void reginsert_limits(int op, long minval, long maxval, char_u *opnd)
2578{
2579 char_u *src;
2580 char_u *dst;
2581 char_u *place;
2582
2583 if (regcode == JUST_CALC_SIZE((char_u *) -1)) {
2584 regsize += 11;
2585 return;
2586 }
2587 src = regcode;
2588 regcode += 11;
2589 dst = regcode;
2590 while (src > opnd)
2591 *--dst = *--src;
2592
2593 place = opnd; /* Op node, where operand used to be. */
2594 *place++ = op;
2595 *place++ = NUL'\000';
2596 *place++ = NUL'\000';
2597 place = re_put_long(place, (long_u)minval);
2598 place = re_put_long(place, (long_u)maxval);
2599 regtail(opnd, place);
2600}
2601
2602/*
2603 * Write a long as four bytes at "p" and return pointer to the next char.
2604 */
2605static char_u *re_put_long(char_u *p, long_u val)
2606{
2607 *p++ = (char_u) ((val >> 24) & 0377);
2608 *p++ = (char_u) ((val >> 16) & 0377);
2609 *p++ = (char_u) ((val >> 8) & 0377);
2610 *p++ = (char_u) (val & 0377);
2611 return p;
2612}
2613
2614/*
2615 * Set the next-pointer at the end of a node chain.
2616 */
2617static void regtail(char_u *p, char_u *val)
2618{
2619 char_u *scan;
2620 char_u *temp;
2621 int offset;
2622
2623 if (p == JUST_CALC_SIZE((char_u *) -1))
2624 return;
2625
2626 /* Find last node. */
2627 scan = p;
2628 for (;; ) {
2629 temp = regnext(scan);
2630 if (temp == NULL((void*)0))
2631 break;
2632 scan = temp;
2633 }
2634
2635 if (OP(scan)((int)*(scan)) == BACK4)
2636 offset = (int)(scan - val);
2637 else
2638 offset = (int)(val - scan);
2639 /* When the offset uses more than 16 bits it can no longer fit in the two
2640 * bytes available. Use a global flag to avoid having to check return
2641 * values in too many places. */
2642 if (offset > 0xffff)
2643 reg_toolong = TRUE1;
2644 else {
2645 *(scan + 1) = (char_u) (((unsigned)offset >> 8) & 0377);
2646 *(scan + 2) = (char_u) (offset & 0377);
2647 }
2648}
2649
2650/*
2651 * Like regtail, on item after a BRANCH; nop if none.
2652 */
2653static void regoptail(char_u *p, char_u *val)
2654{
2655 /* When op is neither BRANCH nor BRACE_COMPLEX0-9, it is "operandless" */
2656 if (p == NULL((void*)0) || p == JUST_CALC_SIZE((char_u *) -1)
2657 || (OP(p)((int)*(p)) != BRANCH3
2658 && (OP(p)((int)*(p)) < BRACE_COMPLEX140 || OP(p)((int)*(p)) > BRACE_COMPLEX140 + 9)))
2659 return;
2660 regtail(OPERAND(p)((p) + 3), val);
2661}
2662
2663/*
2664 * Functions for getting characters from the regexp input.
2665 */
2666
2667static int at_start; /* True when on the first character */
2668static int prev_at_start; /* True when on the second character */
2669
2670/*
2671 * Start parsing at "str".
2672 */
2673static void initchr(char_u *str)
2674{
2675 regparse = str;
2676 prevchr_len = 0;
2677 curchr = prevprevchr = prevchr = nextchr = -1;
2678 at_start = TRUE1;
2679 prev_at_start = FALSE0;
2680}
2681
2682/*
2683 * Save the current parse state, so that it can be restored and parsing
2684 * starts in the same state again.
2685 */
2686static void save_parse_state(parse_state_T *ps)
2687{
2688 ps->regparse = regparse;
2689 ps->prevchr_len = prevchr_len;
2690 ps->curchr = curchr;
2691 ps->prevchr = prevchr;
2692 ps->prevprevchr = prevprevchr;
2693 ps->nextchr = nextchr;
2694 ps->at_start = at_start;
2695 ps->prev_at_start = prev_at_start;
2696 ps->regnpar = regnpar;
2697}
2698
2699/*
2700 * Restore a previously saved parse state.
2701 */
2702static void restore_parse_state(parse_state_T *ps)
2703{
2704 regparse = ps->regparse;
2705 prevchr_len = ps->prevchr_len;
2706 curchr = ps->curchr;
2707 prevchr = ps->prevchr;
2708 prevprevchr = ps->prevprevchr;
2709 nextchr = ps->nextchr;
2710 at_start = ps->at_start;
2711 prev_at_start = ps->prev_at_start;
2712 regnpar = ps->regnpar;
2713}
2714
2715
2716/*
2717 * Get the next character without advancing.
2718 */
2719static int peekchr(void)
2720{
2721 static int after_slash = FALSE0;
2722
2723 if (curchr == -1) {
2724 switch (curchr = regparse[0]) {
2725 case '.':
2726 case '[':
2727 case '~':
2728 /* magic when 'magic' is on */
2729 if (reg_magic >= MAGIC_ON3)
2730 curchr = Magic(curchr)((int)(curchr) - 256);
2731 break;
2732 case '(':
2733 case ')':
2734 case '{':
2735 case '%':
2736 case '+':
2737 case '=':
2738 case '?':
2739 case '@':
2740 case '!':
2741 case '&':
2742 case '|':
2743 case '<':
2744 case '>':
2745 case '#': /* future ext. */
2746 case '"': /* future ext. */
2747 case '\'': /* future ext. */
2748 case ',': /* future ext. */
2749 case '-': /* future ext. */
2750 case ':': /* future ext. */
2751 case ';': /* future ext. */
2752 case '`': /* future ext. */
2753 case '/': /* Can't be used in / command */
2754 /* magic only after "\v" */
2755 if (reg_magic == MAGIC_ALL4)
2756 curchr = Magic(curchr)((int)(curchr) - 256);
2757 break;
2758 case '*':
2759 /* * is not magic as the very first character, eg "?*ptr", when
2760 * after '^', eg "/^*ptr" and when after "\(", "\|", "\&". But
2761 * "\(\*" is not magic, thus must be magic if "after_slash" */
2762 if (reg_magic >= MAGIC_ON3
2763 && !at_start
2764 && !(prev_at_start && prevchr == Magic('^')((int)('^') - 256))
2765 && (after_slash
2766 || (prevchr != Magic('(')((int)('(') - 256)
2767 && prevchr != Magic('&')((int)('&') - 256)
2768 && prevchr != Magic('|')((int)('|') - 256))))
2769 curchr = Magic('*')((int)('*') - 256);
2770 break;
2771 case '^':
2772 /* '^' is only magic as the very first character and if it's after
2773 * "\(", "\|", "\&' or "\n" */
2774 if (reg_magic >= MAGIC_OFF2
2775 && (at_start
2776 || reg_magic == MAGIC_ALL4
2777 || prevchr == Magic('(')((int)('(') - 256)
2778 || prevchr == Magic('|')((int)('|') - 256)
2779 || prevchr == Magic('&')((int)('&') - 256)
2780 || prevchr == Magic('n')((int)('n') - 256)
2781 || (no_Magic(prevchr) == '('
2782 && prevprevchr == Magic('%')((int)('%') - 256)))) {
2783 curchr = Magic('^')((int)('^') - 256);
2784 at_start = TRUE1;
2785 prev_at_start = FALSE0;
2786 }
2787 break;
2788 case '$':
2789 /* '$' is only magic as the very last char and if it's in front of
2790 * either "\|", "\)", "\&", or "\n" */
2791 if (reg_magic >= MAGIC_OFF2) {
2792 char_u *p = regparse + 1;
2793 bool_Bool is_magic_all = (reg_magic == MAGIC_ALL4);
2794
2795 // ignore \c \C \m \M \v \V and \Z after '$'
2796 while (p[0] == '\\' && (p[1] == 'c' || p[1] == 'C'
2797 || p[1] == 'm' || p[1] == 'M'
2798 || p[1] == 'v' || p[1] == 'V'
2799 || p[1] == 'Z')) {
2800 if (p[1] == 'v') {
2801 is_magic_all = true1;
2802 } else if (p[1] == 'm' || p[1] == 'M' || p[1] == 'V') {
2803 is_magic_all = false0;
2804 }
2805 p += 2;
2806 }
2807 if (p[0] == NUL'\000'
2808 || (p[0] == '\\'
2809 && (p[1] == '|' || p[1] == '&' || p[1] == ')'
2810 || p[1] == 'n'))
2811 || (is_magic_all
2812 && (p[0] == '|' || p[0] == '&' || p[0] == ')'))
2813 || reg_magic == MAGIC_ALL4) {
2814 curchr = Magic('$')((int)('$') - 256);
2815 }
2816 }
2817 break;
2818 case '\\':
2819 {
2820 int c = regparse[1];
2821
2822 if (c == NUL'\000')
2823 curchr = '\\'; /* trailing '\' */
2824 else if (
2825 c <= '~' && META_flags[c]
2826 ) {
2827 /*
2828 * META contains everything that may be magic sometimes,
2829 * except ^ and $ ("\^" and "\$" are only magic after
2830 * "\v"). We now fetch the next character and toggle its
2831 * magicness. Therefore, \ is so meta-magic that it is
2832 * not in META.
2833 */
2834 curchr = -1;
2835 prev_at_start = at_start;
2836 at_start = FALSE0; /* be able to say "/\*ptr" */
2837 ++regparse;
2838 ++after_slash;
2839 peekchr();
2840 --regparse;
2841 --after_slash;
2842 curchr = toggle_Magic(curchr);
2843 } else if (vim_strchr(REGEXP_ABBR, c)) {
2844 /*
2845 * Handle abbreviations, like "\t" for TAB -- webb
2846 */
2847 curchr = backslash_trans(c);
2848 } else if (reg_magic == MAGIC_NONE1 && (c == '$' || c == '^'))
2849 curchr = toggle_Magic(c);
2850 else {
2851 /*
2852 * Next character can never be (made) magic?
2853 * Then backslashing it won't do anything.
2854 */
2855 if (has_mbyte)
2856 curchr = (*mb_ptr2char)(regparse + 1);
2857 else
2858 curchr = c;
2859 }
2860 break;
2861 }
2862
2863 default:
2864 if (has_mbyte)
2865 curchr = (*mb_ptr2char)(regparse);
2866 }
2867 }
2868
2869 return curchr;
2870}
2871
2872/*
2873 * Eat one lexed character. Do this in a way that we can undo it.
2874 */
2875static void skipchr(void)
2876{
2877 /* peekchr() eats a backslash, do the same here */
2878 if (*regparse == '\\')
2879 prevchr_len = 1;
2880 else
2881 prevchr_len = 0;
2882 if (regparse[prevchr_len] != NUL'\000') {
2883 if (enc_utf8)
2884 /* exclude composing chars that mb_ptr2len does include */
2885 prevchr_len += utf_ptr2len(regparse + prevchr_len);
2886 else if (has_mbyte)
2887 prevchr_len += (*mb_ptr2len)(regparse + prevchr_len);
2888 else
2889 ++prevchr_len;
2890 }
2891 regparse += prevchr_len;
2892 prev_at_start = at_start;
2893 at_start = FALSE0;
2894 prevprevchr = prevchr;
2895 prevchr = curchr;
2896 curchr = nextchr; /* use previously unget char, or -1 */
2897 nextchr = -1;
2898}
2899
2900/*
2901 * Skip a character while keeping the value of prev_at_start for at_start.
2902 * prevchr and prevprevchr are also kept.
2903 */
2904static void skipchr_keepstart(void)
2905{
2906 int as = prev_at_start;
2907 int pr = prevchr;
2908 int prpr = prevprevchr;
2909
2910 skipchr();
2911 at_start = as;
2912 prevchr = pr;
2913 prevprevchr = prpr;
2914}
2915
2916/*
2917 * Get the next character from the pattern. We know about magic and such, so
2918 * therefore we need a lexical analyzer.
2919 */
2920static int getchr(void)
2921{
2922 int chr = peekchr();
2923
2924 skipchr();
2925 return chr;
2926}
2927
2928/*
2929 * put character back. Works only once!
2930 */
2931static void ungetchr(void)
2932{
2933 nextchr = curchr;
2934 curchr = prevchr;
2935 prevchr = prevprevchr;
2936 at_start = prev_at_start;
2937 prev_at_start = FALSE0;
2938
2939 /* Backup regparse, so that it's at the same position as before the
2940 * getchr(). */
2941 regparse -= prevchr_len;
2942}
2943
2944/*
2945 * Get and return the value of the hex string at the current position.
2946 * Return -1 if there is no valid hex number.
2947 * The position is updated:
2948 * blahblah\%x20asdf
2949 * before-^ ^-after
2950 * The parameter controls the maximum number of input characters. This will be
2951 * 2 when reading a \%x20 sequence and 4 when reading a \%u20AC sequence.
2952 */
2953static int gethexchrs(int maxinputlen)
2954{
2955 int nr = 0;
2956 int c;
2957 int i;
2958
2959 for (i = 0; i < maxinputlen; ++i) {
2960 c = regparse[0];
2961 if (!vim_isxdigit(c))
2962 break;
2963 nr <<= 4;
2964 nr |= hex2nr(c);
2965 ++regparse;
2966 }
2967
2968 if (i == 0)
2969 return -1;
2970 return nr;
2971}
2972
2973/*
2974 * Get and return the value of the decimal string immediately after the
2975 * current position. Return -1 for invalid. Consumes all digits.
2976 */
2977static int getdecchrs(void)
2978{
2979 int nr = 0;
2980 int c;
2981 int i;
2982
2983 for (i = 0;; ++i) {
2984 c = regparse[0];
2985 if (c < '0' || c > '9')
2986 break;
2987 nr *= 10;
2988 nr += c - '0';
2989 ++regparse;
2990 curchr = -1; /* no longer valid */
2991 }
2992
2993 if (i == 0)
2994 return -1;
2995 return nr;
2996}
2997
2998/*
2999 * get and return the value of the octal string immediately after the current
3000 * position. Return -1 for invalid, or 0-255 for valid. Smart enough to handle
3001 * numbers > 377 correctly (for example, 400 is treated as 40) and doesn't
3002 * treat 8 or 9 as recognised characters. Position is updated:
3003 * blahblah\%o210asdf
3004 * before-^ ^-after
3005 */
3006static int getoctchrs(void)
3007{
3008 int nr = 0;
3009 int c;
3010 int i;
3011
3012 for (i = 0; i < 3 && nr < 040; ++i) {
3013 c = regparse[0];
3014 if (c < '0' || c > '7')
3015 break;
3016 nr <<= 3;
3017 nr |= hex2nr(c);
3018 ++regparse;
3019 }
3020
3021 if (i == 0)
3022 return -1;
3023 return nr;
3024}
3025
3026/*
3027 * Get a number after a backslash that is inside [].
3028 * When nothing is recognized return a backslash.
3029 */
3030static int coll_get_char(void)
3031{
3032 int nr = -1;
3033
3034 switch (*regparse++) {
3035 case 'd': nr = getdecchrs(); break;
3036 case 'o': nr = getoctchrs(); break;
3037 case 'x': nr = gethexchrs(2); break;
3038 case 'u': nr = gethexchrs(4); break;
3039 case 'U': nr = gethexchrs(8); break;
3040 }
3041 if (nr < 0) {
3042 /* If getting the number fails be backwards compatible: the character
3043 * is a backslash. */
3044 --regparse;
3045 nr = '\\';
3046 }
3047 return nr;
3048}
3049
3050/*
3051 * read_limits - Read two integers to be taken as a minimum and maximum.
3052 * If the first character is '-', then the range is reversed.
3053 * Should end with 'end'. If minval is missing, zero is default, if maxval is
3054 * missing, a very big number is the default.
3055 */
3056static int read_limits(long *minval, long *maxval)
3057{
3058 int reverse = FALSE0;
3059 char_u *first_char;
3060 long tmp;
3061
3062 if (*regparse == '-') {
3063 /* Starts with '-', so reverse the range later */
3064 regparse++;
3065 reverse = TRUE1;
3066 }
3067 first_char = regparse;
3068 *minval = getdigits(&regparse);
3069 if (*regparse == ',') { /* There is a comma */
3070 if (vim_isdigit(*++regparse))
3071 *maxval = getdigits(&regparse);
3072 else
3073 *maxval = MAX_LIMIT(32767L << 16L);
3074 } else if (VIM_ISDIGIT(*first_char)((unsigned)(*first_char) - '0' < 10))
3075 *maxval = *minval; /* It was \{n} or \{-n} */
3076 else
3077 *maxval = MAX_LIMIT(32767L << 16L); /* It was \{} or \{-} */
3078 if (*regparse == '\\')
3079 regparse++; /* Allow either \{...} or \{...\} */
3080 if (*regparse != '}') {
3081 sprintf((char *)IObuff, _("E554: Syntax error in %s{...}")gettext((char *)("E554: Syntax error in %s{...}")),
3082 reg_magic == MAGIC_ALL4 ? "" : "\\");
3083 EMSG_RET_FAIL(IObuff)return (emsg((char_u *)(IObuff)), rc_did_emsg = 1, 0);
3084 }
3085
3086 /*
3087 * Reverse the range if there was a '-', or make sure it is in the right
3088 * order otherwise.
3089 */
3090 if ((!reverse && *minval > *maxval) || (reverse && *minval < *maxval)) {
3091 tmp = *minval;
3092 *minval = *maxval;
3093 *maxval = tmp;
3094 }
3095 skipchr(); /* let's be friends with the lexer again */
3096 return OK1;
3097}
3098
3099/*
3100 * vim_regexec and friends
3101 */
3102
3103/*
3104 * Global work variables for vim_regexec().
3105 */
3106
3107/* The current match-position is remembered with these variables: */
3108static linenr_T reglnum; /* line number, relative to first line */
3109static char_u *regline; /* start of current line */
3110static char_u *reginput; /* current input, points into "regline" */
3111
3112static int need_clear_subexpr; /* subexpressions still need to be
3113 * cleared */
3114static int need_clear_zsubexpr = FALSE0; /* extmatch subexpressions
3115 * still need to be cleared */
3116
3117
3118/* Save the sub-expressions before attempting a match. */
3119#define save_se(savep, posp, pp)(reg_match == ((void*)0)) ? save_se_multi((savep), (posp)) : save_se_one
((savep), (pp)) \
3120 REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0)) ? save_se_multi((savep), (posp)) : save_se_one((savep), (pp))
3121
3122/* After a failed match restore the sub-expressions. */
3123#define restore_se(savep, posp, pp){ if ((reg_match == ((void*)0))) *(posp) = (savep)->se_u.pos
; else *(pp) = (savep)->se_u.ptr; } { \
3124 if (REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0))) \
3125 *(posp) = (savep)->se_u.pos; \
3126 else \
3127 *(pp) = (savep)->se_u.ptr; }
3128
3129
3130#ifdef REGEXP_DEBUG
3131int regnarrate = 0;
3132#endif
3133
3134/*
3135 * Internal copy of 'ignorecase'. It is set at each call to vim_regexec().
3136 * Normally it gets the value of "rm_ic" or "rmm_ic", but when the pattern
3137 * contains '\c' or '\C' the value is overruled.
3138 */
3139static int ireg_ic;
3140
3141/*
3142 * Similar to ireg_ic, but only for 'combining' characters. Set with \Z flag
3143 * in the regexp. Defaults to false, always.
3144 */
3145static int ireg_icombine;
3146
3147/*
3148 * Copy of "rmm_maxcol": maximum column to search for a match. Zero when
3149 * there is no maximum.
3150 */
3151static colnr_T ireg_maxcol;
3152
3153/*
3154 * Sometimes need to save a copy of a line. Since alloc()/free() is very
3155 * slow, we keep one allocated piece of memory and only re-allocate it when
3156 * it's too small. It's freed in bt_regexec_both() when finished.
3157 */
3158static char_u *reg_tofree = NULL((void*)0);
3159static unsigned reg_tofreelen;
3160
3161/*
3162 * These variables are set when executing a regexp to speed up the execution.
3163 * Which ones are set depends on whether a single-line or multi-line match is
3164 * done:
3165 * single-line multi-line
3166 * reg_match &regmatch_T NULL
3167 * reg_mmatch NULL &regmmatch_T
3168 * reg_startp reg_match->startp <invalid>
3169 * reg_endp reg_match->endp <invalid>
3170 * reg_startpos <invalid> reg_mmatch->startpos
3171 * reg_endpos <invalid> reg_mmatch->endpos
3172 * reg_win NULL window in which to search
3173 * reg_buf curbuf buffer in which to search
3174 * reg_firstlnum <invalid> first line in which to search
3175 * reg_maxline 0 last line nr
3176 * reg_line_lbr FALSE or TRUE FALSE
3177 */
3178static regmatch_T *reg_match;
3179static regmmatch_T *reg_mmatch;
3180static char_u **reg_startp = NULL((void*)0);
3181static char_u **reg_endp = NULL((void*)0);
3182static lpos_T *reg_startpos = NULL((void*)0);
3183static lpos_T *reg_endpos = NULL((void*)0);
3184static win_T *reg_win;
3185static buf_T *reg_buf;
3186static linenr_T reg_firstlnum;
3187static linenr_T reg_maxline;
3188static int reg_line_lbr; /* "\n" in string is line break */
3189
3190/*
3191 * "regstack" and "backpos" are used by regmatch(). They are kept over calls
3192 * to avoid invoking malloc() and free() often.
3193 * "regstack" is a stack with regitem_T items, sometimes preceded by regstar_T
3194 * or regbehind_T.
3195 * "backpos_T" is a table with backpos_T for BACK
3196 */
3197static garray_T regstack = GA_EMPTY_INIT_VALUE{ 0, 0, 0, 1, ((void*)0) };
3198static garray_T backpos = GA_EMPTY_INIT_VALUE{ 0, 0, 0, 1, ((void*)0) };
3199
3200/*
3201 * Both for regstack and backpos tables we use the following strategy of
3202 * allocation (to reduce malloc/free calls):
3203 * - Initial size is fairly small.
3204 * - When needed, the tables are grown bigger (8 times at first, double after
3205 * that).
3206 * - After executing the match we free the memory only if the array has grown.
3207 * Thus the memory is kept allocated when it's at the initial size.
3208 * This makes it fast while not keeping a lot of memory allocated.
3209 * A three times speed increase was observed when using many simple patterns.
3210 */
3211#define REGSTACK_INITIAL2048 2048
3212#define BACKPOS_INITIAL64 64
3213
3214#if defined(EXITFREE) || defined(PROTO)
3215void free_regexp_stuff(void)
3216{
3217 ga_clear(&regstack);
3218 ga_clear(&backpos);
3219 free(reg_tofree);
3220 free(reg_prev_sub);
3221}
3222
3223#endif
3224
3225/*
3226 * Get pointer to the line "lnum", which is relative to "reg_firstlnum".
3227 */
3228static char_u *reg_getline(linenr_T lnum)
3229{
3230 /* when looking behind for a match/no-match lnum is negative. But we
3231 * can't go before line 1 */
3232 if (reg_firstlnum + lnum < 1)
3233 return NULL((void*)0);
3234 if (lnum > reg_maxline)
3235 /* Must have matched the "\n" in the last line. */
3236 return (char_u *)"";
3237 return ml_get_buf(reg_buf, reg_firstlnum + lnum, FALSE0);
3238}
3239
3240static regsave_T behind_pos;
3241
3242static char_u *reg_startzp[NSUBEXP10]; /* Workspace to mark beginning */
3243static char_u *reg_endzp[NSUBEXP10]; /* and end of \z(...\) matches */
3244static lpos_T reg_startzpos[NSUBEXP10]; /* idem, beginning pos */
3245static lpos_T reg_endzpos[NSUBEXP10]; /* idem, end pos */
3246
3247/* TRUE if using multi-line regexp. */
3248#define REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0)) (reg_match == NULL((void*)0))
3249
3250
3251/*
3252 * Match a regexp against a string.
3253 * "rmp->regprog" is a compiled regexp as returned by vim_regcomp().
3254 * Uses curbuf for line count and 'iskeyword'.
3255 * If "line_lbr" is true, consider a "\n" in "line" to be a line break.
3256 *
3257 * Return TRUE if there is a match, FALSE if not.
3258 */
3259static int
3260bt_regexec_nl (
3261 regmatch_T *rmp,
3262 char_u *line, /* string to match against */
3263 colnr_T col, /* column to start looking for match */
3264 bool_Bool line_lbr
3265)
3266{
3267 reg_match = rmp;
3268 reg_mmatch = NULL((void*)0);
3269 reg_maxline = 0;
3270 reg_line_lbr = line_lbr;
3271 reg_buf = curbuf;
3272 reg_win = NULL((void*)0);
3273 ireg_ic = rmp->rm_ic;
3274 ireg_icombine = FALSE0;
3275 ireg_maxcol = 0;
3276 return bt_regexec_both(line, col, NULL((void*)0)) != 0;
3277}
3278
3279
3280/// Matches a regexp against multiple lines.
3281/// "rmp->regprog" is a compiled regexp as returned by vim_regcomp().
3282/// Uses curbuf for line count and 'iskeyword'.
3283///
3284/// @param win Window in which to search or NULL
3285/// @param buf Buffer in which to search
3286/// @param lnum Number of line to start looking for match
3287/// @param col Column to start looking for match
3288/// @param tm Timeout limit or NULL
3289///
3290/// @return zero if there is no match and number of lines contained in the match
3291/// otherwise.
3292static long bt_regexec_multi(regmmatch_T *rmp, win_T *win, buf_T *buf,
3293 linenr_T lnum, colnr_T col, proftime_T *tm)
3294{
3295 long r;
3296
3297 reg_match = NULL((void*)0);
3298 reg_mmatch = rmp;
3299 reg_buf = buf;
3300 reg_win = win;
3301 reg_firstlnum = lnum;
3302 reg_maxline = reg_buf->b_ml.ml_line_count - lnum;
3303 reg_line_lbr = FALSE0;
3304 ireg_ic = rmp->rmm_ic;
3305 ireg_icombine = FALSE0;
3306 ireg_maxcol = rmp->rmm_maxcol;
3307
3308 r = bt_regexec_both(NULL((void*)0), col, tm);
3309
3310 return r;
3311}
3312
3313/*
3314 * Match a regexp against a string ("line" points to the string) or multiple
3315 * lines ("line" is NULL, use reg_getline()).
3316 */
3317static long bt_regexec_both(char_u *line,
3318 colnr_T col, /* column to start looking for match */
3319 proftime_T *tm /* timeout limit or NULL */
3320 )
3321{
3322 bt_regprog_T *prog;
3323 char_u *s;
3324 long retval = 0L;
3325
3326 /* Create "regstack" and "backpos" if they are not allocated yet.
3327 * We allocate *_INITIAL amount of bytes first and then set the grow size
3328 * to much bigger value to avoid many malloc calls in case of deep regular
3329 * expressions. */
3330 if (regstack.ga_data == NULL((void*)0)) {
3331 /* Use an item size of 1 byte, since we push different things
3332 * onto the regstack. */
3333 ga_init(&regstack, 1, REGSTACK_INITIAL2048);
3334 ga_grow(&regstack, REGSTACK_INITIAL2048);
3335 ga_set_growsize(&regstack, REGSTACK_INITIAL2048 * 8);
3336 }
3337
3338 if (backpos.ga_data == NULL((void*)0)) {
3339 ga_init(&backpos, sizeof(backpos_T), BACKPOS_INITIAL64);
3340 ga_grow(&backpos, BACKPOS_INITIAL64);
3341 ga_set_growsize(&backpos, BACKPOS_INITIAL64 * 8);
3342 }
3343
3344 if (REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0))) {
3345 prog = (bt_regprog_T *)reg_mmatch->regprog;
3346 line = reg_getline((linenr_T)0);
3347 reg_startpos = reg_mmatch->startpos;
3348 reg_endpos = reg_mmatch->endpos;
3349 } else {
3350 prog = (bt_regprog_T *)reg_match->regprog;
3351 reg_startp = reg_match->startp;
3352 reg_endp = reg_match->endp;
3353 }
3354
3355 /* Be paranoid... */
3356 if (prog == NULL((void*)0) || line == NULL((void*)0)) {
3357 EMSG(_(e_null))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_null))));
3358 goto theend;
3359 }
3360
3361 /* Check validity of program. */
3362 if (prog_magic_wrong())
3363 goto theend;
3364
3365 /* If the start column is past the maximum column: no need to try. */
3366 if (ireg_maxcol > 0 && col >= ireg_maxcol)
3367 goto theend;
3368
3369 /* If pattern contains "\c" or "\C": overrule value of ireg_ic */
3370 if (prog->regflags & RF_ICASE1)
3371 ireg_ic = TRUE1;
3372 else if (prog->regflags & RF_NOICASE2)
3373 ireg_ic = FALSE0;
3374
3375 /* If pattern contains "\Z" overrule value of ireg_icombine */
3376 if (prog->regflags & RF_ICOMBINE8)
3377 ireg_icombine = TRUE1;
3378
3379 /* If there is a "must appear" string, look for it. */
3380 if (prog->regmust != NULL((void*)0)) {
3381 int c;
3382
3383 if (has_mbyte)
3384 c = (*mb_ptr2char)(prog->regmust);
3385 else
3386 c = *prog->regmust;
3387 s = line + col;
3388
3389 /*
3390 * This is used very often, esp. for ":global". Use three versions of
3391 * the loop to avoid overhead of conditions.
3392 */
3393 if (!ireg_ic
3394 && !has_mbyte
3395 )
3396 while ((s = vim_strbyte(s, c)) != NULL((void*)0)) {
3397 if (cstrncmp(s, prog->regmust, &prog->regmlen) == 0)
3398 break; /* Found it. */
3399 ++s;
3400 }
3401 else if (!ireg_ic || (!enc_utf8 && mb_char2len(c) > 1))
3402 while ((s = vim_strchr(s, c)) != NULL((void*)0)) {
3403 if (cstrncmp(s, prog->regmust, &prog->regmlen) == 0)
3404 break; /* Found it. */
3405 mb_ptr_adv(s)s += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(s) : 1;
3406 }
3407 else
3408 while ((s = cstrchr(s, c)) != NULL((void*)0)) {
3409 if (cstrncmp(s, prog->regmust, &prog->regmlen) == 0)
3410 break; /* Found it. */
3411 mb_ptr_adv(s)s += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(s) : 1;
3412 }
3413 if (s == NULL((void*)0)) /* Not present. */
3414 goto theend;
3415 }
3416
3417 regline = line;
3418 reglnum = 0;
3419 reg_toolong = FALSE0;
3420
3421 /* Simplest case: Anchored match need be tried only once. */
3422 if (prog->reganch) {
3423 int c;
3424
3425 if (has_mbyte)
3426 c = (*mb_ptr2char)(regline + col);
3427 else
3428 c = regline[col];
3429 if (prog->regstart == NUL'\000'
3430 || prog->regstart == c
3431 || (ireg_ic && ((
3432 (enc_utf8 && utf_fold(prog->regstart) == utf_fold(c)))
3433 || (c < 255 && prog->regstart < 255 &&
3434 vim_tolower(prog->regstart) == vim_tolower(c)))))
3435 retval = regtry(prog, col);
3436 else
3437 retval = 0;
3438 } else {
3439 int tm_count = 0;
3440 /* Messy cases: unanchored match. */
3441 while (!got_int) {
3442 if (prog->regstart != NUL'\000') {
3443 /* Skip until the char we know it must start with.
3444 * Used often, do some work to avoid call overhead. */
3445 if (!ireg_ic
3446 && !has_mbyte
3447 )
3448 s = vim_strbyte(regline + col, prog->regstart);
3449 else
3450 s = cstrchr(regline + col, prog->regstart);
3451 if (s == NULL((void*)0)) {
3452 retval = 0;
3453 break;
3454 }
3455 col = (int)(s - regline);
3456 }
3457
3458 /* Check for maximum column to try. */
3459 if (ireg_maxcol > 0 && col >= ireg_maxcol) {
3460 retval = 0;
3461 break;
3462 }
3463
3464 retval = regtry(prog, col);
3465 if (retval > 0)
3466 break;
3467
3468 /* if not currently on the first line, get it again */
3469 if (reglnum != 0) {
3470 reglnum = 0;
3471 regline = reg_getline((linenr_T)0);
3472 }
3473 if (regline[col] == NUL'\000')
3474 break;
3475 if (has_mbyte)
3476 col += (*mb_ptr2len)(regline + col);
3477 else
3478 ++col;
3479 /* Check for timeout once in a twenty times to avoid overhead. */
3480 if (tm != NULL((void*)0) && ++tm_count == 20) {
3481 tm_count = 0;
3482 if (profile_passed_limit(*tm))
3483 break;
3484 }
3485 }
3486 }
3487
3488theend:
3489 /* Free "reg_tofree" when it's a bit big.
3490 * Free regstack and backpos if they are bigger than their initial size. */
3491 if (reg_tofreelen > 400) {
3492 free(reg_tofree);
3493 reg_tofree = NULL((void*)0);
3494 }
3495 if (regstack.ga_maxlen > REGSTACK_INITIAL2048)
3496 ga_clear(&regstack);
3497 if (backpos.ga_maxlen > BACKPOS_INITIAL64)
3498 ga_clear(&backpos);
3499
3500 return retval;
3501}
3502
3503
3504/*
3505 * Create a new extmatch and mark it as referenced once.
3506 */
3507static reg_extmatch_T *make_extmatch(void)
3508{
3509 reg_extmatch_T *em = xcalloc(1, sizeof(reg_extmatch_T));
3510 em->refcnt = 1;
3511 return em;
3512}
3513
3514/*
3515 * Add a reference to an extmatch.
3516 */
3517reg_extmatch_T *ref_extmatch(reg_extmatch_T *em)
3518{
3519 if (em != NULL((void*)0))
3520 em->refcnt++;
3521 return em;
3522}
3523
3524/*
3525 * Remove a reference to an extmatch. If there are no references left, free
3526 * the info.
3527 */
3528void unref_extmatch(reg_extmatch_T *em)
3529{
3530 int i;
3531
3532 if (em != NULL((void*)0) && --em->refcnt <= 0) {
3533 for (i = 0; i < NSUBEXP10; ++i)
3534 free(em->matches[i]);
3535 free(em);
3536 }
3537}
3538
3539/*
3540 * regtry - try match of "prog" with at regline["col"].
3541 * Returns 0 for failure, number of lines contained in the match otherwise.
3542 */
3543static long regtry(bt_regprog_T *prog, colnr_T col)
3544{
3545 reginput = regline + col;
3546 need_clear_subexpr = TRUE1;
3547 /* Clear the external match subpointers if necessary. */
3548 if (prog->reghasz == REX_SET1)
3549 need_clear_zsubexpr = TRUE1;
3550
3551 if (regmatch(prog->program + 1) == 0)
3552 return 0;
3553
3554 cleanup_subexpr();
3555 if (REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0))) {
3556 if (reg_startpos[0].lnum < 0) {
3557 reg_startpos[0].lnum = 0;
3558 reg_startpos[0].col = col;
3559 }
3560 if (reg_endpos[0].lnum < 0) {
3561 reg_endpos[0].lnum = reglnum;
3562 reg_endpos[0].col = (int)(reginput - regline);
3563 } else
3564 /* Use line number of "\ze". */
3565 reglnum = reg_endpos[0].lnum;
3566 } else {
3567 if (reg_startp[0] == NULL((void*)0))
3568 reg_startp[0] = regline + col;
3569 if (reg_endp[0] == NULL((void*)0))
3570 reg_endp[0] = reginput;
3571 }
3572 /* Package any found \z(...\) matches for export. Default is none. */
3573 unref_extmatch(re_extmatch_out);
3574 re_extmatch_out = NULL((void*)0);
3575
3576 if (prog->reghasz == REX_SET1) {
3577 int i;
3578
3579 cleanup_zsubexpr();
3580 re_extmatch_out = make_extmatch();
3581 for (i = 0; i < NSUBEXP10; i++) {
3582 if (REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0))) {
3583 /* Only accept single line matches. */
3584 if (reg_startzpos[i].lnum >= 0
3585 && reg_endzpos[i].lnum == reg_startzpos[i].lnum
3586 && reg_endzpos[i].col >= reg_startzpos[i].col) {
3587 re_extmatch_out->matches[i] =
3588 vim_strnsave(reg_getline(reg_startzpos[i].lnum)
3589 + reg_startzpos[i].col,
3590 reg_endzpos[i].col
3591 - reg_startzpos[i].col);
3592 }
3593 } else {
3594 if (reg_startzp[i] != NULL((void*)0) && reg_endzp[i] != NULL((void*)0))
3595 re_extmatch_out->matches[i] =
3596 vim_strnsave(reg_startzp[i],
3597 (int)(reg_endzp[i] - reg_startzp[i]));
3598 }
3599 }
3600 }
3601 return 1 + reglnum;
3602}
3603
3604
3605/*
3606 * Get class of previous character.
3607 */
3608static int reg_prev_class(void)
3609{
3610 if (reginput > regline)
3611 return mb_get_class_buf(reginput - 1
3612 - (*mb_head_off)(regline, reginput - 1), reg_buf);
3613 return -1;
3614}
3615
3616
3617/*
3618 * Return TRUE if the current reginput position matches the Visual area.
3619 */
3620static int reg_match_visual(void)
3621{
3622 pos_T top, bot;
3623 linenr_T lnum;
3624 colnr_T col;
3625 win_T *wp = reg_win == NULL((void*)0) ? curwin : reg_win;
3626 int mode;
3627 colnr_T start, end;
3628 colnr_T start2, end2;
3629 colnr_T cols;
3630
3631 /* Check if the buffer is the current buffer. */
3632 if (reg_buf != curbuf || VIsual.lnum == 0)
3633 return FALSE0;
3634
3635 if (VIsual_active) {
3636 if (lt(VIsual, wp->w_cursor)(((VIsual).lnum != (wp->w_cursor).lnum) ? (VIsual).lnum <
(wp->w_cursor).lnum : (VIsual).col != (wp->w_cursor).col
? (VIsual).col < (wp->w_cursor).col : (VIsual).coladd <
(wp->w_cursor).coladd)) {
3637 top = VIsual;
3638 bot = wp->w_cursor;
3639 } else {
3640 top = wp->w_cursor;
3641 bot = VIsual;
3642 }
3643 mode = VIsual_mode;
3644 } else {
3645 if (lt(curbuf->b_visual.vi_start, curbuf->b_visual.vi_end)(((curbuf->b_visual.vi_start).lnum != (curbuf->b_visual
.vi_end).lnum) ? (curbuf->b_visual.vi_start).lnum < (curbuf
->b_visual.vi_end).lnum : (curbuf->b_visual.vi_start).col
!= (curbuf->b_visual.vi_end).col ? (curbuf->b_visual.vi_start
).col < (curbuf->b_visual.vi_end).col : (curbuf->b_visual
.vi_start).coladd < (curbuf->b_visual.vi_end).coladd)) {
3646 top = curbuf->b_visual.vi_start;
3647 bot = curbuf->b_visual.vi_end;
3648 } else {
3649 top = curbuf->b_visual.vi_end;
3650 bot = curbuf->b_visual.vi_start;
3651 }
3652 mode = curbuf->b_visual.vi_mode;
3653 }
3654 lnum = reglnum + reg_firstlnum;
3655 if (lnum < top.lnum || lnum > bot.lnum)
3656 return FALSE0;
3657
3658 if (mode == 'v') {
3659 col = (colnr_T)(reginput - regline);
3660 if ((lnum == top.lnum && col < top.col)
3661 || (lnum == bot.lnum && col >= bot.col + (*p_sel != 'e')))
3662 return FALSE0;
3663 } else if (mode == Ctrl_V22) {
3664 getvvcol(wp, &top, &start, NULL((void*)0), &end);
3665 getvvcol(wp, &bot, &start2, NULL((void*)0), &end2);
3666 if (start2 < start)
3667 start = start2;
3668 if (end2 > end)
3669 end = end2;
3670 if (top.col == MAXCOL(0x7fffffffL) || bot.col == MAXCOL(0x7fffffffL))
3671 end = MAXCOL(0x7fffffffL);
3672 cols = win_linetabsize(wp, regline, (colnr_T)(reginput - regline));
3673 if (cols < start || cols > end - (*p_sel == 'e'))
3674 return FALSE0;
3675 }
3676 return TRUE1;
3677}
3678
3679#define ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1 mb_ptr_adv(reginput)reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1
3680
3681/*
3682 * The arguments from BRACE_LIMITS are stored here. They are actually local
3683 * to regmatch(), but they are here to reduce the amount of stack space used
3684 * (it can be called recursively many times).
3685 */
3686static long bl_minval;
3687static long bl_maxval;
3688
3689/*
3690 * regmatch - main matching routine
3691 *
3692 * Conceptually the strategy is simple: Check to see whether the current node
3693 * matches, push an item onto the regstack and loop to see whether the rest
3694 * matches, and then act accordingly. In practice we make some effort to
3695 * avoid using the regstack, in particular by going through "ordinary" nodes
3696 * (that don't need to know whether the rest of the match failed) by a nested
3697 * loop.
3698 *
3699 * Returns TRUE when there is a match. Leaves reginput and reglnum just after
3700 * the last matched character.
3701 * Returns FALSE when there is no match. Leaves reginput and reglnum in an
3702 * undefined state!
3703 */
3704static int
3705regmatch (
3706 char_u *scan /* Current node. */
3707)
3708{
3709 char_u *next; /* Next node. */
3710 int op;
3711 int c;
3712 regitem_T *rp;
3713 int no;
3714 int status; /* one of the RA_ values: */
3715#define RA_FAIL1 1 /* something failed, abort */
3716#define RA_CONT2 2 /* continue in inner loop */
3717#define RA_BREAK3 3 /* break inner loop */
3718#define RA_MATCH4 4 /* successful match */
3719#define RA_NOMATCH5 5 /* didn't match */
3720
3721 /* Make "regstack" and "backpos" empty. They are allocated and freed in
3722 * bt_regexec_both() to reduce malloc()/free() calls. */
3723 regstack.ga_len = 0;
3724 backpos.ga_len = 0;
3725
3726 /*
3727 * Repeat until "regstack" is empty.
3728 */
3729 for (;; ) {
3730 /* Some patterns may take a long time to match, e.g., "\([a-z]\+\)\+Q".
3731 * Allow interrupting them with CTRL-C. */
3732 fast_breakcheck();
3733
3734#ifdef REGEXP_DEBUG
3735 if (scan != NULL((void*)0) && regnarrate) {
3736 mch_errmsg((char *)regprop(scan))fprintf(stderr, "%s", ((char *)regprop(scan)));
3737 mch_errmsg("(\n")fprintf(stderr, "%s", ("(\n"));
3738 }
3739#endif
3740
3741 /*
3742 * Repeat for items that can be matched sequentially, without using the
3743 * regstack.
3744 */
3745 for (;; ) {
3746 if (got_int || scan == NULL((void*)0)) {
3747 status = RA_FAIL1;
3748 break;
3749 }
3750 status = RA_CONT2;
3751
3752#ifdef REGEXP_DEBUG
3753 if (regnarrate) {
3754 mch_errmsg((char *)regprop(scan))fprintf(stderr, "%s", ((char *)regprop(scan)));
3755 mch_errmsg("...\n")fprintf(stderr, "%s", ("...\n"));
3756 if (re_extmatch_in != NULL((void*)0)) {
3757 int i;
3758
3759 mch_errmsg(_("External submatches:\n"))fprintf(stderr, "%s", (gettext((char *)("External submatches:\n"
))));
3760 for (i = 0; i < NSUBEXP10; i++) {
3761 mch_errmsg(" \"")fprintf(stderr, "%s", (" \""));
3762 if (re_extmatch_in->matches[i] != NULL((void*)0))
3763 mch_errmsg((char *)re_extmatch_in->matches[i])fprintf(stderr, "%s", ((char *)re_extmatch_in->matches[i])
);
3764 mch_errmsg("\"\n")fprintf(stderr, "%s", ("\"\n"));
3765 }
3766 }
3767 }
3768#endif
3769 next = regnext(scan);
3770
3771 op = OP(scan)((int)*(scan));
3772 /* Check for character class with NL added. */
3773 if (!reg_line_lbr && WITH_NL(op)((op) >= 20 + 30 && (op) <= 48 + 30) && REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0))
3774 && *reginput == NUL'\000' && reglnum <= reg_maxline) {
3775 reg_nextline();
3776 } else if (reg_line_lbr && WITH_NL(op)((op) >= 20 + 30 && (op) <= 48 + 30) && *reginput == '\n') {
3777 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
3778 } else {
3779 if (WITH_NL(op)((op) >= 20 + 30 && (op) <= 48 + 30))
3780 op -= ADD_NL30;
3781 if (has_mbyte)
3782 c = (*mb_ptr2char)(reginput);
3783 else
3784 c = *reginput;
3785 switch (op) {
3786 case BOL1:
3787 if (reginput != regline)
3788 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3789 break;
3790
3791 case EOL2:
3792 if (c != NUL'\000')
3793 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3794 break;
3795
3796 case RE_BOF201:
3797 /* We're not at the beginning of the file when below the first
3798 * line where we started, not at the start of the line or we
3799 * didn't start at the first line of the buffer. */
3800 if (reglnum != 0 || reginput != regline
3801 || (REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0)) && reg_firstlnum > 1))
3802 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3803 break;
3804
3805 case RE_EOF202:
3806 if (reglnum != reg_maxline || c != NUL'\000')
3807 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3808 break;
3809
3810 case CURSOR203:
3811 /* Check if the buffer is in a window and compare the
3812 * reg_win->w_cursor position to the match position. */
3813 if (reg_win == NULL((void*)0)
3814 || (reglnum + reg_firstlnum != reg_win->w_cursor.lnum)
3815 || ((colnr_T)(reginput - regline) != reg_win->w_cursor.col))
3816 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3817 break;
3818
3819 case RE_MARK207:
3820 /* Compare the mark position to the match position. */
3821 {
3822 int mark = OPERAND(scan)((scan) + 3)[0];
3823 int cmp = OPERAND(scan)((scan) + 3)[1];
3824 pos_T *pos;
3825
3826 pos = getmark_buf(reg_buf, mark, FALSE0);
3827 if (pos == NULL((void*)0) /* mark doesn't exist */
3828 || pos->lnum <= 0 /* mark isn't set in reg_buf */
3829 || (pos->lnum == reglnum + reg_firstlnum
3830 ? (pos->col == (colnr_T)(reginput - regline)
3831 ? (cmp == '<' || cmp == '>')
3832 : (pos->col < (colnr_T)(reginput - regline)
3833 ? cmp != '>'
3834 : cmp != '<'))
3835 : (pos->lnum < reglnum + reg_firstlnum
3836 ? cmp != '>'
3837 : cmp != '<')))
3838 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3839 }
3840 break;
3841
3842 case RE_VISUAL208:
3843 if (!reg_match_visual())
3844 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3845 break;
3846
3847 case RE_LNUM204:
3848 if (!REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0)) || !re_num_cmp((long_u)(reglnum + reg_firstlnum),
3849 scan))
3850 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3851 break;
3852
3853 case RE_COL205:
3854 if (!re_num_cmp((long_u)(reginput - regline) + 1, scan))
3855 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3856 break;
3857
3858 case RE_VCOL206:
3859 if (!re_num_cmp((long_u)win_linetabsize(
3860 reg_win == NULL((void*)0) ? curwin : reg_win,
3861 regline, (colnr_T)(reginput - regline)) + 1, scan))
3862 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3863 break;
3864
3865 case BOW15: /* \<word; reginput points to w */
3866 if (c == NUL'\000') /* Can't match at end of line */
3867 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3868 else if (has_mbyte) {
3869 int this_class;
3870
3871 /* Get class of current and previous char (if it exists). */
3872 this_class = mb_get_class_buf(reginput, reg_buf);
3873 if (this_class <= 1)
3874 status = RA_NOMATCH5; /* not on a word at all */
3875 else if (reg_prev_class() == this_class)
3876 status = RA_NOMATCH5; /* previous char is in same word */
3877 } else {
3878 if (!vim_iswordc_buf(c, reg_buf) || (reginput > regline
3879 && vim_iswordc_buf(reginput[-1
3880 ], reg_buf)))
3881 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3882 }
3883 break;
3884
3885 case EOW16: /* word\>; reginput points after d */
3886 if (reginput == regline) /* Can't match at start of line */
3887 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3888 else if (has_mbyte) {
3889 int this_class, prev_class;
3890
3891 /* Get class of current and previous char (if it exists). */
3892 this_class = mb_get_class_buf(reginput, reg_buf);
3893 prev_class = reg_prev_class();
3894 if (this_class == prev_class
3895 || prev_class == 0 || prev_class == 1)
3896 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3897 } else {
3898 if (!vim_iswordc_buf(reginput[-1], reg_buf)
3899 || (reginput[0] != NUL'\000' && vim_iswordc_buf(c, reg_buf)))
3900 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3901 }
3902 break; /* Matched with EOW */
3903
3904 case ANY20:
3905 /* ANY does not match new lines. */
3906 if (c == NUL'\000')
3907 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3908 else
3909 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
3910 break;
3911
3912 case IDENT23:
3913 if (!vim_isIDc(c))
3914 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3915 else
3916 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
3917 break;
3918
3919 case SIDENT24:
3920 if (VIM_ISDIGIT(*reginput)((unsigned)(*reginput) - '0' < 10) || !vim_isIDc(c))
3921 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3922 else
3923 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
3924 break;
3925
3926 case KWORD25:
3927 if (!vim_iswordp_buf(reginput, reg_buf))
3928 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3929 else
3930 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
3931 break;
3932
3933 case SKWORD26:
3934 if (VIM_ISDIGIT(*reginput)((unsigned)(*reginput) - '0' < 10) || !vim_iswordp_buf(reginput, reg_buf))
3935 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3936 else
3937 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
3938 break;
3939
3940 case FNAME27:
3941 if (!vim_isfilec(c))
3942 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3943 else
3944 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
3945 break;
3946
3947 case SFNAME28:
3948 if (VIM_ISDIGIT(*reginput)((unsigned)(*reginput) - '0' < 10) || !vim_isfilec(c))
3949 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3950 else
3951 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
3952 break;
3953
3954 case PRINT29:
3955 if (!vim_isprintc(PTR2CHAR(reginput)(has_mbyte ? mb_ptr2char(reginput) : (int)*(reginput))))
3956 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3957 else
3958 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
3959 break;
3960
3961 case SPRINT30:
3962 if (VIM_ISDIGIT(*reginput)((unsigned)(*reginput) - '0' < 10) || !vim_isprintc(PTR2CHAR(reginput)(has_mbyte ? mb_ptr2char(reginput) : (int)*(reginput))))
3963 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3964 else
3965 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
3966 break;
3967
3968 case WHITE31:
3969 if (!vim_iswhite(c)((c) == ' ' || (c) == '\t'))
3970 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3971 else
3972 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
3973 break;
3974
3975 case NWHITE32:
3976 if (c == NUL'\000' || vim_iswhite(c)((c) == ' ' || (c) == '\t'))
3977 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3978 else
3979 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
3980 break;
3981
3982 case DIGIT33:
3983 if (!ri_digit(c)(c < 0x100 && (class_tab[c] & 0x01)))
3984 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3985 else
3986 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
3987 break;
3988
3989 case NDIGIT34:
3990 if (c == NUL'\000' || ri_digit(c)(c < 0x100 && (class_tab[c] & 0x01)))
3991 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3992 else
3993 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
3994 break;
3995
3996 case HEX35:
3997 if (!ri_hex(c)(c < 0x100 && (class_tab[c] & 0x02)))
3998 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
3999 else
4000 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
4001 break;
4002
4003 case NHEX36:
4004 if (c == NUL'\000' || ri_hex(c)(c < 0x100 && (class_tab[c] & 0x02)))
4005 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4006 else
4007 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
4008 break;
4009
4010 case OCTAL37:
4011 if (!ri_octal(c)(c < 0x100 && (class_tab[c] & 0x04)))
4012 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4013 else
4014 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
4015 break;
4016
4017 case NOCTAL38:
4018 if (c == NUL'\000' || ri_octal(c)(c < 0x100 && (class_tab[c] & 0x04)))
4019 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4020 else
4021 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
4022 break;
4023
4024 case WORD39:
4025 if (!ri_word(c)(c < 0x100 && (class_tab[c] & 0x08)))
4026 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4027 else
4028 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
4029 break;
4030
4031 case NWORD40:
4032 if (c == NUL'\000' || ri_word(c)(c < 0x100 && (class_tab[c] & 0x08)))
4033 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4034 else
4035 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
4036 break;
4037
4038 case HEAD41:
4039 if (!ri_head(c)(c < 0x100 && (class_tab[c] & 0x10)))
4040 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4041 else
4042 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
4043 break;
4044
4045 case NHEAD42:
4046 if (c == NUL'\000' || ri_head(c)(c < 0x100 && (class_tab[c] & 0x10)))
4047 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4048 else
4049 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
4050 break;
4051
4052 case ALPHA43:
4053 if (!ri_alpha(c)(c < 0x100 && (class_tab[c] & 0x20)))
4054 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4055 else
4056 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
4057 break;
4058
4059 case NALPHA44:
4060 if (c == NUL'\000' || ri_alpha(c)(c < 0x100 && (class_tab[c] & 0x20)))
4061 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4062 else
4063 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
4064 break;
4065
4066 case LOWER45:
4067 if (!ri_lower(c)(c < 0x100 && (class_tab[c] & 0x40)))
4068 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4069 else
4070 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
4071 break;
4072
4073 case NLOWER46:
4074 if (c == NUL'\000' || ri_lower(c)(c < 0x100 && (class_tab[c] & 0x40)))
4075 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4076 else
4077 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
4078 break;
4079
4080 case UPPER47:
4081 if (!ri_upper(c)(c < 0x100 && (class_tab[c] & 0x80)))
4082 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4083 else
4084 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
4085 break;
4086
4087 case NUPPER48:
4088 if (c == NUL'\000' || ri_upper(c)(c < 0x100 && (class_tab[c] & 0x80)))
4089 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4090 else
4091 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
4092 break;
4093
4094 case EXACTLY5:
4095 {
4096 int len;
4097 char_u *opnd;
4098
4099 opnd = OPERAND(scan)((scan) + 3);
4100 /* Inline the first byte, for speed. */
4101 if (*opnd != *reginput
4102 && (!ireg_ic || (
4103 !enc_utf8 &&
4104 vim_tolower(*opnd) != vim_tolower(*reginput))))
4105 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4106 else if (*opnd == NUL'\000') {
4107 /* match empty string always works; happens when "~" is
4108 * empty. */
4109 } else {
4110 if (opnd[1] == NUL'\000' && !(enc_utf8 && ireg_ic)) {
4111 len = 1; /* matched a single byte above */
4112 } else {
4113 // Need to match first byte again for multi-byte.
4114 len = (int)STRLEN(opnd)strlen((char *)(opnd));
4115 if (cstrncmp(opnd, reginput, &len) != 0) {
4116 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4117 }
4118 }
4119 // Check for following composing character, unless %C
4120 // follows (skips over all composing chars).
4121 if (status != RA_NOMATCH5 && enc_utf8
4122 && UTF_COMPOSINGLIKE(reginput, reginput + len)utf_composinglike((reginput), (reginput + len))
4123 && !ireg_icombine
4124 && OP(next)((int)*(next)) != RE_COMPOSING209) {
4125 // raaron: This code makes a composing character get
4126 // ignored, which is the correct behavior (sometimes)
4127 // for voweled Hebrew texts.
4128 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4129 }
4130 if (status != RA_NOMATCH5) {
4131 reginput += len;
4132 }
4133 }
4134 }
4135 break;
4136
4137 case ANYOF21:
4138 case ANYBUT22:
4139 if (c == NUL'\000')
4140 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4141 else if ((cstrchr(OPERAND(scan)((scan) + 3), c) == NULL((void*)0)) == (op == ANYOF21))
4142 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4143 else
4144 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
4145 break;
4146
4147 case MULTIBYTECODE200:
4148 if (has_mbyte) {
4149 int i, len;
4150 char_u *opnd;
4151 int opndc = 0, inpc;
4152
4153 opnd = OPERAND(scan)((scan) + 3);
4154 /* Safety check (just in case 'encoding' was changed since
4155 * compiling the program). */
4156 if ((len = (*mb_ptr2len)(opnd)) < 2) {
4157 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4158 break;
4159 }
4160 if (enc_utf8)
4161 opndc = mb_ptr2char(opnd);
4162 if (enc_utf8 && utf_iscomposing(opndc)) {
4163 /* When only a composing char is given match at any
4164 * position where that composing char appears. */
4165 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4166 for (i = 0; reginput[i] != NUL'\000'; i += utf_char2len(inpc)) {
4167 inpc = mb_ptr2char(reginput + i);
4168 if (!utf_iscomposing(inpc)) {
4169 if (i > 0)
4170 break;
4171 } else if (opndc == inpc) {
4172 /* Include all following composing chars. */
4173 len = i + mb_ptr2len(reginput + i);
4174 status = RA_MATCH4;
4175 break;
4176 }
4177 }
4178 } else
4179 for (i = 0; i < len; ++i)
4180 if (opnd[i] != reginput[i]) {
4181 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4182 break;
4183 }
4184 reginput += len;
4185 } else
4186 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4187 break;
4188
4189 case RE_COMPOSING209:
4190 if (enc_utf8) {
4191 // Skip composing characters.
4192 while (utf_iscomposing(utf_ptr2char(reginput))) {
4193 mb_cptr_adv(reginput)reginput += enc_utf8 ? utf_ptr2len(reginput) : has_mbyte ? (*
mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
4194 }
4195 }
4196 break;
4197
4198 case NOTHING6:
4199 break;
4200
4201 case BACK4:
4202 {
4203 int i;
4204
4205 /*
4206 * When we run into BACK we need to check if we don't keep
4207 * looping without matching any input. The second and later
4208 * times a BACK is encountered it fails if the input is still
4209 * at the same position as the previous time.
4210 * The positions are stored in "backpos" and found by the
4211 * current value of "scan", the position in the RE program.
4212 */
4213 backpos_T *bp = (backpos_T *)backpos.ga_data;
4214 for (i = 0; i < backpos.ga_len; ++i)
4215 if (bp[i].bp_scan == scan)
4216 break;
4217 if (i == backpos.ga_len) {
4218 backpos_T *p = GA_APPEND_VIA_PTR(backpos_T, &backpos)ga_append_via_ptr(&backpos, sizeof(backpos_T));
4219 p->bp_scan = scan;
4220 } else if (reg_save_equal(&bp[i].bp_pos))
4221 /* Still at same position as last time, fail. */
4222 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4223
4224 if (status != RA_FAIL1 && status != RA_NOMATCH5)
4225 reg_save(&bp[i].bp_pos, &backpos);
4226 }
4227 break;
4228
4229 case MOPEN80 + 0: /* Match start: \zs */
4230 case MOPEN80 + 1: /* \( */
4231 case MOPEN80 + 2:
4232 case MOPEN80 + 3:
4233 case MOPEN80 + 4:
4234 case MOPEN80 + 5:
4235 case MOPEN80 + 6:
4236 case MOPEN80 + 7:
4237 case MOPEN80 + 8:
4238 case MOPEN80 + 9:
4239 {
4240 no = op - MOPEN80;
4241 cleanup_subexpr();
4242 rp = regstack_push(RS_MOPEN, scan);
4243 if (rp == NULL((void*)0))
4244 status = RA_FAIL1;
4245 else {
4246 rp->rs_no = no;
4247 save_se(&rp->rs_un.sesave, &reg_startpos[no],(reg_match == ((void*)0)) ? save_se_multi((&rp->rs_un.
sesave), (&reg_startpos[no])) : save_se_one((&rp->
rs_un.sesave), (&reg_startp[no]))
4248 &reg_startp[no])(reg_match == ((void*)0)) ? save_se_multi((&rp->rs_un.
sesave), (&reg_startpos[no])) : save_se_one((&rp->
rs_un.sesave), (&reg_startp[no]));
4249 /* We simply continue and handle the result when done. */
4250 }
4251 }
4252 break;
4253
4254 case NOPEN150: /* \%( */
4255 case NCLOSE151: /* \) after \%( */
4256 if (regstack_push(RS_NOPEN, scan) == NULL((void*)0))
4257 status = RA_FAIL1;
4258 /* We simply continue and handle the result when done. */
4259 break;
4260
4261 case ZOPEN110 + 1:
4262 case ZOPEN110 + 2:
4263 case ZOPEN110 + 3:
4264 case ZOPEN110 + 4:
4265 case ZOPEN110 + 5:
4266 case ZOPEN110 + 6:
4267 case ZOPEN110 + 7:
4268 case ZOPEN110 + 8:
4269 case ZOPEN110 + 9:
4270 {
4271 no = op - ZOPEN110;
4272 cleanup_zsubexpr();
4273 rp = regstack_push(RS_ZOPEN, scan);
4274 if (rp == NULL((void*)0))
4275 status = RA_FAIL1;
4276 else {
4277 rp->rs_no = no;
4278 save_se(&rp->rs_un.sesave, &reg_startzpos[no],(reg_match == ((void*)0)) ? save_se_multi((&rp->rs_un.
sesave), (&reg_startzpos[no])) : save_se_one((&rp->
rs_un.sesave), (&reg_startzp[no]))
4279 &reg_startzp[no])(reg_match == ((void*)0)) ? save_se_multi((&rp->rs_un.
sesave), (&reg_startzpos[no])) : save_se_one((&rp->
rs_un.sesave), (&reg_startzp[no]));
4280 /* We simply continue and handle the result when done. */
4281 }
4282 }
4283 break;
4284
4285 case MCLOSE90 + 0: /* Match end: \ze */
4286 case MCLOSE90 + 1: /* \) */
4287 case MCLOSE90 + 2:
4288 case MCLOSE90 + 3:
4289 case MCLOSE90 + 4:
4290 case MCLOSE90 + 5:
4291 case MCLOSE90 + 6:
4292 case MCLOSE90 + 7:
4293 case MCLOSE90 + 8:
4294 case MCLOSE90 + 9:
4295 {
4296 no = op - MCLOSE90;
4297 cleanup_subexpr();
4298 rp = regstack_push(RS_MCLOSE, scan);
4299 if (rp == NULL((void*)0))
4300 status = RA_FAIL1;
4301 else {
4302 rp->rs_no = no;
4303 save_se(&rp->rs_un.sesave, &reg_endpos[no], &reg_endp[no])(reg_match == ((void*)0)) ? save_se_multi((&rp->rs_un.
sesave), (&reg_endpos[no])) : save_se_one((&rp->rs_un
.sesave), (&reg_endp[no]));
4304 /* We simply continue and handle the result when done. */
4305 }
4306 }
4307 break;
4308
4309 case ZCLOSE120 + 1: /* \) after \z( */
4310 case ZCLOSE120 + 2:
4311 case ZCLOSE120 + 3:
4312 case ZCLOSE120 + 4:
4313 case ZCLOSE120 + 5:
4314 case ZCLOSE120 + 6:
4315 case ZCLOSE120 + 7:
4316 case ZCLOSE120 + 8:
4317 case ZCLOSE120 + 9:
4318 {
4319 no = op - ZCLOSE120;
4320 cleanup_zsubexpr();
4321 rp = regstack_push(RS_ZCLOSE, scan);
4322 if (rp == NULL((void*)0))
4323 status = RA_FAIL1;
4324 else {
4325 rp->rs_no = no;
4326 save_se(&rp->rs_un.sesave, &reg_endzpos[no],(reg_match == ((void*)0)) ? save_se_multi((&rp->rs_un.
sesave), (&reg_endzpos[no])) : save_se_one((&rp->rs_un
.sesave), (&reg_endzp[no]))
4327 &reg_endzp[no])(reg_match == ((void*)0)) ? save_se_multi((&rp->rs_un.
sesave), (&reg_endzpos[no])) : save_se_one((&rp->rs_un
.sesave), (&reg_endzp[no]));
4328 /* We simply continue and handle the result when done. */
4329 }
4330 }
4331 break;
4332
4333 case BACKREF100 + 1:
4334 case BACKREF100 + 2:
4335 case BACKREF100 + 3:
4336 case BACKREF100 + 4:
4337 case BACKREF100 + 5:
4338 case BACKREF100 + 6:
4339 case BACKREF100 + 7:
4340 case BACKREF100 + 8:
4341 case BACKREF100 + 9:
4342 {
4343 int len;
4344
4345 no = op - BACKREF100;
4346 cleanup_subexpr();
4347 if (!REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0))) { /* Single-line regexp */
4348 if (reg_startp[no] == NULL((void*)0) || reg_endp[no] == NULL((void*)0)) {
4349 /* Backref was not set: Match an empty string. */
4350 len = 0;
4351 } else {
4352 /* Compare current input with back-ref in the same
4353 * line. */
4354 len = (int)(reg_endp[no] - reg_startp[no]);
4355 if (cstrncmp(reg_startp[no], reginput, &len) != 0)
4356 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4357 }
4358 } else { /* Multi-line regexp */
4359 if (reg_startpos[no].lnum < 0 || reg_endpos[no].lnum < 0) {
4360 /* Backref was not set: Match an empty string. */
4361 len = 0;
4362 } else {
4363 if (reg_startpos[no].lnum == reglnum
4364 && reg_endpos[no].lnum == reglnum) {
4365 /* Compare back-ref within the current line. */
4366 len = reg_endpos[no].col - reg_startpos[no].col;
4367 if (cstrncmp(regline + reg_startpos[no].col,
4368 reginput, &len) != 0)
4369 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4370 } else {
4371 /* Messy situation: Need to compare between two
4372 * lines. */
4373 int r = match_with_backref(
4374 reg_startpos[no].lnum,
4375 reg_startpos[no].col,
4376 reg_endpos[no].lnum,
4377 reg_endpos[no].col,
4378 &len);
4379
4380 if (r != RA_MATCH4)
4381 status = r;
4382 }
4383 }
4384 }
4385
4386 /* Matched the backref, skip over it. */
4387 reginput += len;
4388 }
4389 break;
4390
4391 case ZREF130 + 1:
4392 case ZREF130 + 2:
4393 case ZREF130 + 3:
4394 case ZREF130 + 4:
4395 case ZREF130 + 5:
4396 case ZREF130 + 6:
4397 case ZREF130 + 7:
4398 case ZREF130 + 8:
4399 case ZREF130 + 9:
4400 {
4401 int len;
4402
4403 cleanup_zsubexpr();
4404 no = op - ZREF130;
4405 if (re_extmatch_in != NULL((void*)0)
4406 && re_extmatch_in->matches[no] != NULL((void*)0)) {
4407 len = (int)STRLEN(re_extmatch_in->matches[no])strlen((char *)(re_extmatch_in->matches[no]));
4408 if (cstrncmp(re_extmatch_in->matches[no],
4409 reginput, &len) != 0)
4410 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4411 else
4412 reginput += len;
4413 } else {
4414 /* Backref was not set: Match an empty string. */
4415 }
4416 }
4417 break;
4418
4419 case BRANCH3:
4420 {
4421 if (OP(next)((int)*(next)) != BRANCH3) /* No choice. */
4422 next = OPERAND(scan)((scan) + 3); /* Avoid recursion. */
4423 else {
4424 rp = regstack_push(RS_BRANCH, scan);
4425 if (rp == NULL((void*)0))
4426 status = RA_FAIL1;
4427 else
4428 status = RA_BREAK3; /* rest is below */
4429 }
4430 }
4431 break;
4432
4433 case BRACE_LIMITS17:
4434 {
4435 if (OP(next)((int)*(next)) == BRACE_SIMPLE14) {
4436 bl_minval = OPERAND_MIN(scan)(((long)(scan)[3] << 24) + ((long)(scan)[4] << 16
) + ((long)(scan)[5] << 8) + (long)(scan)[6]);
4437 bl_maxval = OPERAND_MAX(scan)(((long)((scan) + 4)[3] << 24) + ((long)((scan) + 4)[4]
<< 16) + ((long)((scan) + 4)[5] << 8) + (long)((
scan) + 4)[6]);
4438 } else if (OP(next)((int)*(next)) >= BRACE_COMPLEX140
4439 && OP(next)((int)*(next)) < BRACE_COMPLEX140 + 10) {
4440 no = OP(next)((int)*(next)) - BRACE_COMPLEX140;
4441 brace_min[no] = OPERAND_MIN(scan)(((long)(scan)[3] << 24) + ((long)(scan)[4] << 16
) + ((long)(scan)[5] << 8) + (long)(scan)[6]);
4442 brace_max[no] = OPERAND_MAX(scan)(((long)((scan) + 4)[3] << 24) + ((long)((scan) + 4)[4]
<< 16) + ((long)((scan) + 4)[5] << 8) + (long)((
scan) + 4)[6]);
4443 brace_count[no] = 0;
4444 } else {
4445 EMSG(_(e_internal))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_internal)))); /* Shouldn't happen */
4446 status = RA_FAIL1;
4447 }
4448 }
4449 break;
4450
4451 case BRACE_COMPLEX140 + 0:
4452 case BRACE_COMPLEX140 + 1:
4453 case BRACE_COMPLEX140 + 2:
4454 case BRACE_COMPLEX140 + 3:
4455 case BRACE_COMPLEX140 + 4:
4456 case BRACE_COMPLEX140 + 5:
4457 case BRACE_COMPLEX140 + 6:
4458 case BRACE_COMPLEX140 + 7:
4459 case BRACE_COMPLEX140 + 8:
4460 case BRACE_COMPLEX140 + 9:
4461 {
4462 no = op - BRACE_COMPLEX140;
4463 ++brace_count[no];
4464
4465 /* If not matched enough times yet, try one more */
4466 if (brace_count[no] <= (brace_min[no] <= brace_max[no]
4467 ? brace_min[no] : brace_max[no])) {
4468 rp = regstack_push(RS_BRCPLX_MORE, scan);
4469 if (rp == NULL((void*)0))
4470 status = RA_FAIL1;
4471 else {
4472 rp->rs_no = no;
4473 reg_save(&rp->rs_un.regsave, &backpos);
4474 next = OPERAND(scan)((scan) + 3);
4475 /* We continue and handle the result when done. */
4476 }
4477 break;
4478 }
4479
4480 /* If matched enough times, may try matching some more */
4481 if (brace_min[no] <= brace_max[no]) {
4482 /* Range is the normal way around, use longest match */
4483 if (brace_count[no] <= brace_max[no]) {
4484 rp = regstack_push(RS_BRCPLX_LONG, scan);
4485 if (rp == NULL((void*)0))
4486 status = RA_FAIL1;
4487 else {
4488 rp->rs_no = no;
4489 reg_save(&rp->rs_un.regsave, &backpos);
4490 next = OPERAND(scan)((scan) + 3);
4491 /* We continue and handle the result when done. */
4492 }
4493 }
4494 } else {
4495 /* Range is backwards, use shortest match first */
4496 if (brace_count[no] <= brace_min[no]) {
4497 rp = regstack_push(RS_BRCPLX_SHORT, scan);
4498 if (rp == NULL((void*)0))
4499 status = RA_FAIL1;
4500 else {
4501 reg_save(&rp->rs_un.regsave, &backpos);
4502 /* We continue and handle the result when done. */
4503 }
4504 }
4505 }
4506 }
4507 break;
4508
4509 case BRACE_SIMPLE14:
4510 case STAR7:
4511 case PLUS8:
4512 {
4513 regstar_T rst;
4514
4515 /*
4516 * Lookahead to avoid useless match attempts when we know
4517 * what character comes next.
4518 */
4519 if (OP(next)((int)*(next)) == EXACTLY5) {
4520 rst.nextb = *OPERAND(next)((next) + 3);
4521 if (ireg_ic) {
4522 if (vim_isupper(rst.nextb))
4523 rst.nextb_ic = vim_tolower(rst.nextb);
4524 else
4525 rst.nextb_ic = vim_toupper(rst.nextb);
4526 } else
4527 rst.nextb_ic = rst.nextb;
4528 } else {
4529 rst.nextb = NUL'\000';
4530 rst.nextb_ic = NUL'\000';
4531 }
4532 if (op != BRACE_SIMPLE14) {
4533 rst.minval = (op == STAR7) ? 0 : 1;
4534 rst.maxval = MAX_LIMIT(32767L << 16L);
4535 } else {
4536 rst.minval = bl_minval;
4537 rst.maxval = bl_maxval;
4538 }
4539
4540 /*
4541 * When maxval > minval, try matching as much as possible, up
4542 * to maxval. When maxval < minval, try matching at least the
4543 * minimal number (since the range is backwards, that's also
4544 * maxval!).
4545 */
4546 rst.count = regrepeat(OPERAND(scan)((scan) + 3), rst.maxval);
4547 if (got_int) {
4548 status = RA_FAIL1;
4549 break;
4550 }
4551 if (rst.minval <= rst.maxval
4552 ? rst.count >= rst.minval : rst.count >= rst.maxval) {
4553 /* It could match. Prepare for trying to match what
4554 * follows. The code is below. Parameters are stored in
4555 * a regstar_T on the regstack. */
4556 if ((long)((unsigned)regstack.ga_len >> 10) >= p_mmp) {
4557 EMSG(_(e_maxmempat))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_maxmempat))));
4558 status = RA_FAIL1;
4559 } else {
4560 ga_grow(&regstack, sizeof(regstar_T));
4561 regstack.ga_len += sizeof(regstar_T);
4562 rp = regstack_push(rst.minval <= rst.maxval
4563 ? RS_STAR_LONG : RS_STAR_SHORT, scan);
4564 if (rp == NULL((void*)0))
4565 status = RA_FAIL1;
4566 else {
4567 *(((regstar_T *)rp) - 1) = rst;
4568 status = RA_BREAK3; /* skip the restore bits */
4569 }
4570 }
4571 } else
4572 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4573
4574 }
4575 break;
4576
4577 case NOMATCH10:
4578 case MATCH9:
4579 case SUBPAT13:
4580 rp = regstack_push(RS_NOMATCH, scan);
4581 if (rp == NULL((void*)0))
4582 status = RA_FAIL1;
4583 else {
4584 rp->rs_no = op;
4585 reg_save(&rp->rs_un.regsave, &backpos);
4586 next = OPERAND(scan)((scan) + 3);
4587 /* We continue and handle the result when done. */
4588 }
4589 break;
4590
4591 case BEHIND11:
4592 case NOBEHIND12:
4593 /* Need a bit of room to store extra positions. */
4594 if ((long)((unsigned)regstack.ga_len >> 10) >= p_mmp) {
4595 EMSG(_(e_maxmempat))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_maxmempat))));
4596 status = RA_FAIL1;
4597 } else {
4598 ga_grow(&regstack, sizeof(regbehind_T));
4599 regstack.ga_len += sizeof(regbehind_T);
4600 rp = regstack_push(RS_BEHIND1, scan);
4601 if (rp == NULL((void*)0))
4602 status = RA_FAIL1;
4603 else {
4604 /* Need to save the subexpr to be able to restore them
4605 * when there is a match but we don't use it. */
4606 save_subexpr(((regbehind_T *)rp) - 1);
4607
4608 rp->rs_no = op;
4609 reg_save(&rp->rs_un.regsave, &backpos);
4610 /* First try if what follows matches. If it does then we
4611 * check the behind match by looping. */
4612 }
4613 }
4614 break;
4615
4616 case BHPOS19:
4617 if (REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0))) {
4618 if (behind_pos.rs_u.pos.col != (colnr_T)(reginput - regline)
4619 || behind_pos.rs_u.pos.lnum != reglnum)
4620 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4621 } else if (behind_pos.rs_u.ptr != reginput)
4622 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4623 break;
4624
4625 case NEWL18:
4626 if ((c != NUL'\000' || !REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0)) || reglnum > reg_maxline
4627 || reg_line_lbr) && (c != '\n' || !reg_line_lbr))
4628 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4629 else if (reg_line_lbr)
4630 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
4631 else
4632 reg_nextline();
4633 break;
4634
4635 case END0:
4636 status = RA_MATCH4; /* Success! */
4637 break;
4638
4639 default:
4640 EMSG(_(e_re_corr))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_re_corr))));
4641#ifdef REGEXP_DEBUG
4642 printf("Illegal op code %d\n", op);
4643#endif
4644 status = RA_FAIL1;
4645 break;
4646 }
4647 }
4648
4649 /* If we can't continue sequentially, break the inner loop. */
4650 if (status != RA_CONT2)
4651 break;
4652
4653 /* Continue in inner loop, advance to next item. */
4654 scan = next;
4655
4656 } /* end of inner loop */
4657
4658 /*
4659 * If there is something on the regstack execute the code for the state.
4660 * If the state is popped then loop and use the older state.
4661 */
4662 while (!GA_EMPTY(&regstack)((&regstack)->ga_len <= 0) && status != RA_FAIL1) {
4663 rp = (regitem_T *)((char *)regstack.ga_data + regstack.ga_len) - 1;
4664 switch (rp->rs_state) {
4665 case RS_NOPEN:
4666 /* Result is passed on as-is, simply pop the state. */
4667 regstack_pop(&scan);
4668 break;
4669
4670 case RS_MOPEN:
4671 /* Pop the state. Restore pointers when there is no match. */
4672 if (status == RA_NOMATCH5)
4673 restore_se(&rp->rs_un.sesave, &reg_startpos[rp->rs_no],{ if ((reg_match == ((void*)0))) *(&reg_startpos[rp->rs_no
]) = (&rp->rs_un.sesave)->se_u.pos; else *(&reg_startp
[rp->rs_no]) = (&rp->rs_un.sesave)->se_u.ptr; }
4674 &reg_startp[rp->rs_no]){ if ((reg_match == ((void*)0))) *(&reg_startpos[rp->rs_no
]) = (&rp->rs_un.sesave)->se_u.pos; else *(&reg_startp
[rp->rs_no]) = (&rp->rs_un.sesave)->se_u.ptr; };
4675 regstack_pop(&scan);
4676 break;
4677
4678 case RS_ZOPEN:
4679 /* Pop the state. Restore pointers when there is no match. */
4680 if (status == RA_NOMATCH5)
4681 restore_se(&rp->rs_un.sesave, &reg_startzpos[rp->rs_no],{ if ((reg_match == ((void*)0))) *(&reg_startzpos[rp->
rs_no]) = (&rp->rs_un.sesave)->se_u.pos; else *(&
reg_startzp[rp->rs_no]) = (&rp->rs_un.sesave)->se_u
.ptr; }
4682 &reg_startzp[rp->rs_no]){ if ((reg_match == ((void*)0))) *(&reg_startzpos[rp->
rs_no]) = (&rp->rs_un.sesave)->se_u.pos; else *(&
reg_startzp[rp->rs_no]) = (&rp->rs_un.sesave)->se_u
.ptr; };
4683 regstack_pop(&scan);
4684 break;
4685
4686 case RS_MCLOSE:
4687 /* Pop the state. Restore pointers when there is no match. */
4688 if (status == RA_NOMATCH5)
4689 restore_se(&rp->rs_un.sesave, &reg_endpos[rp->rs_no],{ if ((reg_match == ((void*)0))) *(&reg_endpos[rp->rs_no
]) = (&rp->rs_un.sesave)->se_u.pos; else *(&reg_endp
[rp->rs_no]) = (&rp->rs_un.sesave)->se_u.ptr; }
4690 &reg_endp[rp->rs_no]){ if ((reg_match == ((void*)0))) *(&reg_endpos[rp->rs_no
]) = (&rp->rs_un.sesave)->se_u.pos; else *(&reg_endp
[rp->rs_no]) = (&rp->rs_un.sesave)->se_u.ptr; };
4691 regstack_pop(&scan);
4692 break;
4693
4694 case RS_ZCLOSE:
4695 /* Pop the state. Restore pointers when there is no match. */
4696 if (status == RA_NOMATCH5)
4697 restore_se(&rp->rs_un.sesave, &reg_endzpos[rp->rs_no],{ if ((reg_match == ((void*)0))) *(&reg_endzpos[rp->rs_no
]) = (&rp->rs_un.sesave)->se_u.pos; else *(&reg_endzp
[rp->rs_no]) = (&rp->rs_un.sesave)->se_u.ptr; }
4698 &reg_endzp[rp->rs_no]){ if ((reg_match == ((void*)0))) *(&reg_endzpos[rp->rs_no
]) = (&rp->rs_un.sesave)->se_u.pos; else *(&reg_endzp
[rp->rs_no]) = (&rp->rs_un.sesave)->se_u.ptr; };
4699 regstack_pop(&scan);
4700 break;
4701
4702 case RS_BRANCH:
4703 if (status == RA_MATCH4)
4704 /* this branch matched, use it */
4705 regstack_pop(&scan);
4706 else {
4707 if (status != RA_BREAK3) {
4708 /* After a non-matching branch: try next one. */
4709 reg_restore(&rp->rs_un.regsave, &backpos);
4710 scan = rp->rs_scan;
4711 }
4712 if (scan == NULL((void*)0) || OP(scan)((int)*(scan)) != BRANCH3) {
4713 /* no more branches, didn't find a match */
4714 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4715 regstack_pop(&scan);
4716 } else {
4717 /* Prepare to try a branch. */
4718 rp->rs_scan = regnext(scan);
4719 reg_save(&rp->rs_un.regsave, &backpos);
4720 scan = OPERAND(scan)((scan) + 3);
4721 }
4722 }
4723 break;
4724
4725 case RS_BRCPLX_MORE:
4726 /* Pop the state. Restore pointers when there is no match. */
4727 if (status == RA_NOMATCH5) {
4728 reg_restore(&rp->rs_un.regsave, &backpos);
4729 --brace_count[rp->rs_no]; /* decrement match count */
4730 }
4731 regstack_pop(&scan);
4732 break;
4733
4734 case RS_BRCPLX_LONG:
4735 /* Pop the state. Restore pointers when there is no match. */
4736 if (status == RA_NOMATCH5) {
4737 /* There was no match, but we did find enough matches. */
4738 reg_restore(&rp->rs_un.regsave, &backpos);
4739 --brace_count[rp->rs_no];
4740 /* continue with the items after "\{}" */
4741 status = RA_CONT2;
4742 }
4743 regstack_pop(&scan);
4744 if (status == RA_CONT2)
4745 scan = regnext(scan);
4746 break;
4747
4748 case RS_BRCPLX_SHORT:
4749 /* Pop the state. Restore pointers when there is no match. */
4750 if (status == RA_NOMATCH5)
4751 /* There was no match, try to match one more item. */
4752 reg_restore(&rp->rs_un.regsave, &backpos);
4753 regstack_pop(&scan);
4754 if (status == RA_NOMATCH5) {
4755 scan = OPERAND(scan)((scan) + 3);
4756 status = RA_CONT2;
4757 }
4758 break;
4759
4760 case RS_NOMATCH:
4761 /* Pop the state. If the operand matches for NOMATCH or
4762 * doesn't match for MATCH/SUBPAT, we fail. Otherwise backup,
4763 * except for SUBPAT, and continue with the next item. */
4764 if (status == (rp->rs_no == NOMATCH10 ? RA_MATCH4 : RA_NOMATCH5))
4765 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4766 else {
4767 status = RA_CONT2;
4768 if (rp->rs_no != SUBPAT13) /* zero-width */
4769 reg_restore(&rp->rs_un.regsave, &backpos);
4770 }
4771 regstack_pop(&scan);
4772 if (status == RA_CONT2)
4773 scan = regnext(scan);
4774 break;
4775
4776 case RS_BEHIND1:
4777 if (status == RA_NOMATCH5) {
4778 regstack_pop(&scan);
4779 regstack.ga_len -= sizeof(regbehind_T);
4780 } else {
4781 /* The stuff after BEHIND/NOBEHIND matches. Now try if
4782 * the behind part does (not) match before the current
4783 * position in the input. This must be done at every
4784 * position in the input and checking if the match ends at
4785 * the current position. */
4786
4787 /* save the position after the found match for next */
4788 reg_save(&(((regbehind_T *)rp) - 1)->save_after, &backpos);
4789
4790 /* Start looking for a match with operand at the current
4791 * position. Go back one character until we find the
4792 * result, hitting the start of the line or the previous
4793 * line (for multi-line matching).
4794 * Set behind_pos to where the match should end, BHPOS
4795 * will match it. Save the current value. */
4796 (((regbehind_T *)rp) - 1)->save_behind = behind_pos;
4797 behind_pos = rp->rs_un.regsave;
4798
4799 rp->rs_state = RS_BEHIND2;
4800
4801 reg_restore(&rp->rs_un.regsave, &backpos);
4802 scan = OPERAND(rp->rs_scan)((rp->rs_scan) + 3) + 4;
4803 }
4804 break;
4805
4806 case RS_BEHIND2:
4807 /*
4808 * Looping for BEHIND / NOBEHIND match.
4809 */
4810 if (status == RA_MATCH4 && reg_save_equal(&behind_pos)) {
4811 /* found a match that ends where "next" started */
4812 behind_pos = (((regbehind_T *)rp) - 1)->save_behind;
4813 if (rp->rs_no == BEHIND11)
4814 reg_restore(&(((regbehind_T *)rp) - 1)->save_after,
4815 &backpos);
4816 else {
4817 /* But we didn't want a match. Need to restore the
4818 * subexpr, because what follows matched, so they have
4819 * been set. */
4820 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4821 restore_subexpr(((regbehind_T *)rp) - 1);
4822 }
4823 regstack_pop(&scan);
4824 regstack.ga_len -= sizeof(regbehind_T);
4825 } else {
4826 long limit;
4827
4828 /* No match or a match that doesn't end where we want it: Go
4829 * back one character. May go to previous line once. */
4830 no = OK1;
4831 limit = OPERAND_MIN(rp->rs_scan)(((long)(rp->rs_scan)[3] << 24) + ((long)(rp->rs_scan
)[4] << 16) + ((long)(rp->rs_scan)[5] << 8) + (
long)(rp->rs_scan)[6]);
4832 if (REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0))) {
4833 if (limit > 0
4834 && ((rp->rs_un.regsave.rs_u.pos.lnum
4835 < behind_pos.rs_u.pos.lnum
4836 ? (colnr_T)STRLEN(regline)strlen((char *)(regline))
4837 : behind_pos.rs_u.pos.col)
4838 - rp->rs_un.regsave.rs_u.pos.col >= limit))
4839 no = FAIL0;
4840 else if (rp->rs_un.regsave.rs_u.pos.col == 0) {
4841 if (rp->rs_un.regsave.rs_u.pos.lnum
4842 < behind_pos.rs_u.pos.lnum
4843 || reg_getline(
4844 --rp->rs_un.regsave.rs_u.pos.lnum)
4845 == NULL((void*)0))
4846 no = FAIL0;
4847 else {
4848 reg_restore(&rp->rs_un.regsave, &backpos);
4849 rp->rs_un.regsave.rs_u.pos.col =
4850 (colnr_T)STRLEN(regline)strlen((char *)(regline));
4851 }
4852 } else {
4853 if (has_mbyte)
4854 rp->rs_un.regsave.rs_u.pos.col -=
4855 (*mb_head_off)(regline, regline
4856 + rp->rs_un.regsave.rs_u.pos.col - 1) + 1;
4857 else
4858 --rp->rs_un.regsave.rs_u.pos.col;
4859 }
4860 } else {
4861 if (rp->rs_un.regsave.rs_u.ptr == regline)
4862 no = FAIL0;
4863 else {
4864 mb_ptr_back(regline, rp->rs_un.regsave.rs_u.ptr)rp->rs_un.regsave.rs_u.ptr -= has_mbyte ? ((*mb_head_off)(
regline, rp->rs_un.regsave.rs_u.ptr - 1) + 1) : 1;
4865 if (limit > 0 && (long)(behind_pos.rs_u.ptr
4866 - rp->rs_un.regsave.rs_u.ptr) > limit)
4867 no = FAIL0;
4868 }
4869 }
4870 if (no == OK1) {
4871 /* Advanced, prepare for finding match again. */
4872 reg_restore(&rp->rs_un.regsave, &backpos);
4873 scan = OPERAND(rp->rs_scan)((rp->rs_scan) + 3) + 4;
4874 if (status == RA_MATCH4) {
4875 /* We did match, so subexpr may have been changed,
4876 * need to restore them for the next try. */
4877 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4878 restore_subexpr(((regbehind_T *)rp) - 1);
4879 }
4880 } else {
4881 /* Can't advance. For NOBEHIND that's a match. */
4882 behind_pos = (((regbehind_T *)rp) - 1)->save_behind;
4883 if (rp->rs_no == NOBEHIND12) {
4884 reg_restore(&(((regbehind_T *)rp) - 1)->save_after,
4885 &backpos);
4886 status = RA_MATCH4;
4887 } else {
4888 /* We do want a proper match. Need to restore the
4889 * subexpr if we had a match, because they may have
4890 * been set. */
4891 if (status == RA_MATCH4) {
4892 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4893 restore_subexpr(((regbehind_T *)rp) - 1);
4894 }
4895 }
4896 regstack_pop(&scan);
4897 regstack.ga_len -= sizeof(regbehind_T);
4898 }
4899 }
4900 break;
4901
4902 case RS_STAR_LONG:
4903 case RS_STAR_SHORT:
4904 {
4905 regstar_T *rst = ((regstar_T *)rp) - 1;
4906
4907 if (status == RA_MATCH4) {
4908 regstack_pop(&scan);
4909 regstack.ga_len -= sizeof(regstar_T);
4910 break;
4911 }
4912
4913 /* Tried once already, restore input pointers. */
4914 if (status != RA_BREAK3)
4915 reg_restore(&rp->rs_un.regsave, &backpos);
4916
4917 /* Repeat until we found a position where it could match. */
4918 for (;; ) {
4919 if (status != RA_BREAK3) {
4920 /* Tried first position already, advance. */
4921 if (rp->rs_state == RS_STAR_LONG) {
