4922 /* Trying for longest match, but couldn't or
4923 * didn't match -- back up one char. */
4924 if (--rst->count < rst->minval)
4925 break;
4926 if (reginput == regline) {
4927 /* backup to last char of previous line */
4928 --reglnum;
4929 regline = reg_getline(reglnum);
4930 /* Just in case regrepeat() didn't count
4931 * right. */
4932 if (regline == NULL((void*)0))
4933 break;
4934 reginput = regline + STRLEN(regline)strlen((char *)(regline));
4935 fast_breakcheck();
4936 } else
4937 mb_ptr_back(regline, reginput)reginput -= has_mbyte ? ((*mb_head_off)(regline, reginput - 1
) + 1) : 1;
4938 } else {
4939 /* Range is backwards, use shortest match first.
4940 * Careful: maxval and minval are exchanged!
4941 * Couldn't or didn't match: try advancing one
4942 * char. */
4943 if (rst->count == rst->minval
4944 || regrepeat(OPERAND(rp->rs_scan)((rp->rs_scan) + 3), 1L) == 0)
4945 break;
4946 ++rst->count;
4947 }
4948 if (got_int)
4949 break;
4950 } else
4951 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4952
4953 /* If it could match, try it. */
4954 if (rst->nextb == NUL'\000' || *reginput == rst->nextb
4955 || *reginput == rst->nextb_ic) {
4956 reg_save(&rp->rs_un.regsave, &backpos);
4957 scan = regnext(rp->rs_scan);
4958 status = RA_CONT2;
4959 break;
4960 }
4961 }
4962 if (status != RA_CONT2) {
4963 /* Failed. */
4964 regstack_pop(&scan);
4965 regstack.ga_len -= sizeof(regstar_T);
4966 status = RA_NOMATCH5;
4967 }
4968 }
4969 break;
4970 }
4971
4972 /* If we want to continue the inner loop or didn't pop a state
4973 * continue matching loop */
4974 if (status == RA_CONT2 || rp == (regitem_T *)
4975 ((char *)regstack.ga_data + regstack.ga_len) - 1)
4976 break;
4977 }
4978
4979 /* May need to continue with the inner loop, starting at "scan". */
4980 if (status == RA_CONT2)
4981 continue;
4982
4983 /*
4984 * If the regstack is empty or something failed we are done.
4985 */
4986 if (GA_EMPTY(&regstack)((&regstack)->ga_len <= 0) || status == RA_FAIL1) {
4987 if (scan == NULL((void*)0)) {
4988 /*
4989 * We get here only if there's trouble -- normally "case END" is
4990 * the terminating point.
4991 */
4992 EMSG(_(e_re_corr))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_re_corr))));
4993#ifdef REGEXP_DEBUG
4994 printf("Premature EOL\n");
4995#endif
4996 }
4997 if (status == RA_FAIL1)
4998 got_int = TRUE1;
4999 return status == RA_MATCH4;
5000 }
5001
5002 } /* End of loop until the regstack is empty. */
5003
5004 /* NOTREACHED */
5005}
5006
5007/*
5008 * Push an item onto the regstack.
5009 * Returns pointer to new item. Returns NULL when out of memory.
5010 */
5011static regitem_T *regstack_push(regstate_T state, char_u *scan)
5012{
5013 regitem_T *rp;
5014
5015 if ((long)((unsigned)regstack.ga_len >> 10) >= p_mmp) {
5016 EMSG(_(e_maxmempat))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_maxmempat))));
5017 return NULL((void*)0);
5018 }
5019 ga_grow(&regstack, sizeof(regitem_T));
5020
5021 rp = (regitem_T *)((char *)regstack.ga_data + regstack.ga_len);
5022 rp->rs_state = state;
5023 rp->rs_scan = scan;
5024
5025 regstack.ga_len += sizeof(regitem_T);
5026 return rp;
5027}
5028
5029/*
5030 * Pop an item from the regstack.
5031 */
5032static void regstack_pop(char_u **scan)
5033{
5034 regitem_T *rp;
5035
5036 rp = (regitem_T *)((char *)regstack.ga_data + regstack.ga_len) - 1;
5037 *scan = rp->rs_scan;
5038
5039 regstack.ga_len -= sizeof(regitem_T);
5040}
5041
5042/*
5043 * regrepeat - repeatedly match something simple, return how many.
5044 * Advances reginput (and reglnum) to just after the matched chars.
5045 */
5046static int
5047regrepeat (
5048 char_u *p,
5049 long maxcount /* maximum number of matches allowed */
5050)
5051{
5052 long count = 0;
5053 char_u *scan;
5054 char_u *opnd;
5055 int mask;
5056 int testval = 0;
5057
5058 scan = reginput; /* Make local copy of reginput for speed. */
5059 opnd = OPERAND(p)((p) + 3);
5060 switch (OP(p)((int)*(p))) {
5061 case ANY20:
5062 case ANY20 + ADD_NL30:
5063 while (count < maxcount) {
5064 /* Matching anything means we continue until end-of-line (or
5065 * end-of-file for ANY + ADD_NL), only limited by maxcount. */
5066 while (*scan != NUL'\000' && count < maxcount) {
5067 ++count;
5068 mb_ptr_adv(scan)scan += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(scan) : 1;
5069 }
5070 if (!REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0)) || !WITH_NL(OP(p))((((int)*(p))) >= 20 + 30 && (((int)*(p))) <= 48
+ 30) || reglnum > reg_maxline
5071 || reg_line_lbr || count == maxcount)
5072 break;
5073 ++count; /* count the line-break */
5074 reg_nextline();
5075 scan = reginput;
5076 if (got_int)
5077 break;
5078 }
5079 break;
5080
5081 case IDENT23:
5082 case IDENT23 + ADD_NL30:
5083 testval = TRUE1;
5084 /*FALLTHROUGH*/
5085 case SIDENT24:
5086 case SIDENT24 + ADD_NL30:
5087 while (count < maxcount) {
5088 if (vim_isIDc(PTR2CHAR(scan)(has_mbyte ? mb_ptr2char(scan) : (int)*(scan))) && (testval || !VIM_ISDIGIT(*scan)((unsigned)(*scan) - '0' < 10))) {
5089 mb_ptr_adv(scan)scan += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(scan) : 1;
5090 } else if (*scan == NUL'\000') {
5091 if (!REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0)) || !WITH_NL(OP(p))((((int)*(p))) >= 20 + 30 && (((int)*(p))) <= 48
+ 30) || reglnum > reg_maxline
5092 || reg_line_lbr)
5093 break;
5094 reg_nextline();
5095 scan = reginput;
5096 if (got_int)
5097 break;
5098 } else if (reg_line_lbr && *scan == '\n' && WITH_NL(OP(p))((((int)*(p))) >= 20 + 30 && (((int)*(p))) <= 48
+ 30))
5099 ++scan;
5100 else
5101 break;
5102 ++count;
5103 }
5104 break;
5105
5106 case KWORD25:
5107 case KWORD25 + ADD_NL30:
5108 testval = TRUE1;
5109 /*FALLTHROUGH*/
5110 case SKWORD26:
5111 case SKWORD26 + ADD_NL30:
5112 while (count < maxcount) {
5113 if (vim_iswordp_buf(scan, reg_buf)
5114 && (testval || !VIM_ISDIGIT(*scan)((unsigned)(*scan) - '0' < 10))) {
5115 mb_ptr_adv(scan)scan += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(scan) : 1;
5116 } else if (*scan == NUL'\000') {
5117 if (!REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0)) || !WITH_NL(OP(p))((((int)*(p))) >= 20 + 30 && (((int)*(p))) <= 48
+ 30) || reglnum > reg_maxline
5118 || reg_line_lbr)
5119 break;
5120 reg_nextline();
5121 scan = reginput;
5122 if (got_int)
5123 break;
5124 } else if (reg_line_lbr && *scan == '\n' && WITH_NL(OP(p))((((int)*(p))) >= 20 + 30 && (((int)*(p))) <= 48
+ 30))
5125 ++scan;
5126 else
5127 break;
5128 ++count;
5129 }
5130 break;
5131
5132 case FNAME27:
5133 case FNAME27 + ADD_NL30:
5134 testval = TRUE1;
5135 /*FALLTHROUGH*/
5136 case SFNAME28:
5137 case SFNAME28 + ADD_NL30:
5138 while (count < maxcount) {
5139 if (vim_isfilec(PTR2CHAR(scan)(has_mbyte ? mb_ptr2char(scan) : (int)*(scan))) && (testval || !VIM_ISDIGIT(*scan)((unsigned)(*scan) - '0' < 10))) {
5140 mb_ptr_adv(scan)scan += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(scan) : 1;
5141 } else if (*scan == NUL'\000') {
5142 if (!REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0)) || !WITH_NL(OP(p))((((int)*(p))) >= 20 + 30 && (((int)*(p))) <= 48
+ 30) || reglnum > reg_maxline
5143 || reg_line_lbr)
5144 break;
5145 reg_nextline();
5146 scan = reginput;
5147 if (got_int)
5148 break;
5149 } else if (reg_line_lbr && *scan == '\n' && WITH_NL(OP(p))((((int)*(p))) >= 20 + 30 && (((int)*(p))) <= 48
+ 30))
5150 ++scan;
5151 else
5152 break;
5153 ++count;
5154 }
5155 break;
5156
5157 case PRINT29:
5158 case PRINT29 + ADD_NL30:
5159 testval = TRUE1;
5160 /*FALLTHROUGH*/
5161 case SPRINT30:
5162 case SPRINT30 + ADD_NL30:
5163 while (count < maxcount) {
5164 if (*scan == NUL'\000') {
5165 if (!REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0)) || !WITH_NL(OP(p))((((int)*(p))) >= 20 + 30 && (((int)*(p))) <= 48
+ 30) || reglnum > reg_maxline
5166 || reg_line_lbr)
5167 break;
5168 reg_nextline();
5169 scan = reginput;
5170 if (got_int)
5171 break;
5172 } else if (vim_isprintc(PTR2CHAR(scan)(has_mbyte ? mb_ptr2char(scan) : (int)*(scan))) == 1
5173 && (testval || !VIM_ISDIGIT(*scan)((unsigned)(*scan) - '0' < 10))) {
5174 mb_ptr_adv(scan)scan += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(scan) : 1;
5175 } else if (reg_line_lbr && *scan == '\n' && WITH_NL(OP(p))((((int)*(p))) >= 20 + 30 && (((int)*(p))) <= 48
+ 30))
5176 ++scan;
5177 else
5178 break;
5179 ++count;
5180 }
5181 break;
5182
5183 case WHITE31:
5184 case WHITE31 + ADD_NL30:
5185 testval = mask = RI_WHITE0x100;
5186do_class:
5187 while (count < maxcount) {
5188 int l;
5189 if (*scan == NUL'\000') {
5190 if (!REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0)) || !WITH_NL(OP(p))((((int)*(p))) >= 20 + 30 && (((int)*(p))) <= 48
+ 30) || reglnum > reg_maxline
5191 || reg_line_lbr)
5192 break;
5193 reg_nextline();
5194 scan = reginput;
5195 if (got_int)
5196 break;
5197 } else if (has_mbyte && (l = (*mb_ptr2len)(scan)) > 1) {
5198 if (testval != 0)
5199 break;
5200 scan += l;
5201 } else if ((class_tab[*scan] & mask) == testval)
5202 ++scan;
5203 else if (reg_line_lbr && *scan == '\n' && WITH_NL(OP(p))((((int)*(p))) >= 20 + 30 && (((int)*(p))) <= 48
+ 30))
5204 ++scan;
5205 else
5206 break;
5207 ++count;
5208 }
5209 break;
5210
5211 case NWHITE32:
5212 case NWHITE32 + ADD_NL30:
5213 mask = RI_WHITE0x100;
5214 goto do_class;
5215 case DIGIT33:
5216 case DIGIT33 + ADD_NL30:
5217 testval = mask = RI_DIGIT0x01;
5218 goto do_class;
5219 case NDIGIT34:
5220 case NDIGIT34 + ADD_NL30:
5221 mask = RI_DIGIT0x01;
5222 goto do_class;
5223 case HEX35:
5224 case HEX35 + ADD_NL30:
5225 testval = mask = RI_HEX0x02;
5226 goto do_class;
5227 case NHEX36:
5228 case NHEX36 + ADD_NL30:
5229 mask = RI_HEX0x02;
5230 goto do_class;
5231 case OCTAL37:
5232 case OCTAL37 + ADD_NL30:
5233 testval = mask = RI_OCTAL0x04;
5234 goto do_class;
5235 case NOCTAL38:
5236 case NOCTAL38 + ADD_NL30:
5237 mask = RI_OCTAL0x04;
5238 goto do_class;
5239 case WORD39:
5240 case WORD39 + ADD_NL30:
5241 testval = mask = RI_WORD0x08;
5242 goto do_class;
5243 case NWORD40:
5244 case NWORD40 + ADD_NL30:
5245 mask = RI_WORD0x08;
5246 goto do_class;
5247 case HEAD41:
5248 case HEAD41 + ADD_NL30:
5249 testval = mask = RI_HEAD0x10;
5250 goto do_class;
5251 case NHEAD42:
5252 case NHEAD42 + ADD_NL30:
5253 mask = RI_HEAD0x10;
5254 goto do_class;
5255 case ALPHA43:
5256 case ALPHA43 + ADD_NL30:
5257 testval = mask = RI_ALPHA0x20;
5258 goto do_class;
5259 case NALPHA44:
5260 case NALPHA44 + ADD_NL30:
5261 mask = RI_ALPHA0x20;
5262 goto do_class;
5263 case LOWER45:
5264 case LOWER45 + ADD_NL30:
5265 testval = mask = RI_LOWER0x40;
5266 goto do_class;
5267 case NLOWER46:
5268 case NLOWER46 + ADD_NL30:
5269 mask = RI_LOWER0x40;
5270 goto do_class;
5271 case UPPER47:
5272 case UPPER47 + ADD_NL30:
5273 testval = mask = RI_UPPER0x80;
5274 goto do_class;
5275 case NUPPER48:
5276 case NUPPER48 + ADD_NL30:
5277 mask = RI_UPPER0x80;
5278 goto do_class;
5279
5280 case EXACTLY5:
5281 {
5282 int cu, cl;
5283
5284 /* This doesn't do a multi-byte character, because a MULTIBYTECODE
5285 * would have been used for it. It does handle single-byte
5286 * characters, such as latin1. */
5287 if (ireg_ic) {
5288 cu = vim_toupper(*opnd);
5289 cl = vim_tolower(*opnd);
5290 while (count < maxcount && (*scan == cu || *scan == cl)) {
5291 count++;
5292 scan++;
5293 }
5294 } else {
5295 cu = *opnd;
5296 while (count < maxcount && *scan == cu) {
5297 count++;
5298 scan++;
5299 }
5300 }
5301 break;
5302 }
5303
5304 case MULTIBYTECODE200:
5305 {
5306 int i, len, cf = 0;
5307
5308 /* Safety check (just in case 'encoding' was changed since
5309 * compiling the program). */
5310 if ((len = (*mb_ptr2len)(opnd)) > 1) {
5311 if (ireg_ic && enc_utf8)
5312 cf = utf_fold(utf_ptr2char(opnd));
5313 while (count < maxcount) {
5314 for (i = 0; i < len; ++i)
5315 if (opnd[i] != scan[i])
5316 break;
5317 if (i < len && (!ireg_ic || !enc_utf8
5318 || utf_fold(utf_ptr2char(scan)) != cf))
5319 break;
5320 scan += len;
5321 ++count;
5322 }
5323 }
5324 }
5325 break;
5326
5327 case ANYOF21:
5328 case ANYOF21 + ADD_NL30:
5329 testval = TRUE1;
5330 /*FALLTHROUGH*/
5331
5332 case ANYBUT22:
5333 case ANYBUT22 + ADD_NL30:
5334 while (count < maxcount) {
5335 int len;
5336 if (*scan == NUL'\000') {
5337 if (!REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0)) || !WITH_NL(OP(p))((((int)*(p))) >= 20 + 30 && (((int)*(p))) <= 48
+ 30) || reglnum > reg_maxline
5338 || reg_line_lbr)
5339 break;
5340 reg_nextline();
5341 scan = reginput;
5342 if (got_int)
5343 break;
5344 } else if (reg_line_lbr && *scan == '\n' && WITH_NL(OP(p))((((int)*(p))) >= 20 + 30 && (((int)*(p))) <= 48
+ 30))
5345 ++scan;
5346 else if (has_mbyte && (len = (*mb_ptr2len)(scan)) > 1) {
5347 if ((cstrchr(opnd, (*mb_ptr2char)(scan)) == NULL((void*)0)) == testval)
5348 break;
5349 scan += len;
5350 } else {
5351 if ((cstrchr(opnd, *scan) == NULL((void*)0)) == testval)
5352 break;
5353 ++scan;
5354 }
5355 ++count;
5356 }
5357 break;
5358
5359 case NEWL18:
5360 while (count < maxcount
5361 && ((*scan == NUL'\000' && reglnum <= reg_maxline && !reg_line_lbr
5362 && REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0))) || (*scan == '\n' && reg_line_lbr))) {
5363 count++;
5364 if (reg_line_lbr)
5365 ADVANCE_REGINPUT()reginput += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(reginput) : 1;
5366 else
5367 reg_nextline();
5368 scan = reginput;
5369 if (got_int)
5370 break;
5371 }
5372 break;
5373
5374 default: /* Oh dear. Called inappropriately. */
5375 EMSG(_(e_re_corr))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_re_corr))));
5376#ifdef REGEXP_DEBUG
5377 printf("Called regrepeat with op code %d\n", OP(p)((int)*(p)));
5378#endif
5379 break;
5380 }
5381
5382 reginput = scan;
5383
5384 return (int)count;
5385}
5386
5387/*
5388 * regnext - dig the "next" pointer out of a node
5389 * Returns NULL when calculating size, when there is no next item and when
5390 * there is an error.
5391 */
5392static char_u *regnext(char_u *p)
5393{
5394 int offset;
5395
5396 if (p == JUST_CALC_SIZE((char_u *) -1) || reg_toolong)
5397 return NULL((void*)0);
5398
5399 offset = NEXT(p)(((*((p) + 1) & 0377) << 8) + (*((p) + 2) & 0377
));
5400 if (offset == 0)
5401 return NULL((void*)0);
5402
5403 if (OP(p)((int)*(p)) == BACK4)
5404 return p - offset;
5405 else
5406 return p + offset;
5407}
5408
5409/*
5410 * Check the regexp program for its magic number.
5411 * Return TRUE if it's wrong.
5412 */
5413static int prog_magic_wrong(void)
5414{
5415 regprog_T *prog;
5416
5417 prog = REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0)) ? reg_mmatch->regprog : reg_match->regprog;
5418 if (prog->engine == &nfa_regengine)
5419 /* For NFA matcher we don't check the magic */
5420 return FALSE0;
5421
5422 if (UCHARAT(((bt_regprog_T *)prog)->program)((int)*(char_u *)(((bt_regprog_T *)prog)->program)) != REGMAGIC0234) {
5423 EMSG(_(e_re_corr))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_re_corr))));
5424 return TRUE1;
5425 }
5426 return FALSE0;
5427}
5428
5429/*
5430 * Cleanup the subexpressions, if this wasn't done yet.
5431 * This construction is used to clear the subexpressions only when they are
5432 * used (to increase speed).
5433 */
5434static void cleanup_subexpr(void)
5435{
5436 if (need_clear_subexpr) {
5437 if (REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0))) {
5438 /* Use 0xff to set lnum to -1 */
5439 memset(reg_startpos, 0xff, sizeof(lpos_T) * NSUBEXP10);
5440 memset(reg_endpos, 0xff, sizeof(lpos_T) * NSUBEXP10);
5441 } else {
5442 memset(reg_startp, 0, sizeof(char_u *) * NSUBEXP10);
5443 memset(reg_endp, 0, sizeof(char_u *) * NSUBEXP10);
5444 }
5445 need_clear_subexpr = FALSE0;
5446 }
5447}
5448
5449static void cleanup_zsubexpr(void)
5450{
5451 if (need_clear_zsubexpr) {
5452 if (REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0))) {
5453 /* Use 0xff to set lnum to -1 */
5454 memset(reg_startzpos, 0xff, sizeof(lpos_T) * NSUBEXP10);
5455 memset(reg_endzpos, 0xff, sizeof(lpos_T) * NSUBEXP10);
5456 } else {
5457 memset(reg_startzp, 0, sizeof(char_u *) * NSUBEXP10);
5458 memset(reg_endzp, 0, sizeof(char_u *) * NSUBEXP10);
5459 }
5460 need_clear_zsubexpr = FALSE0;
5461 }
5462}
5463
5464/*
5465 * Save the current subexpr to "bp", so that they can be restored
5466 * later by restore_subexpr().
5467 */
5468static void save_subexpr(regbehind_T *bp)
5469{
5470 int i;
5471
5472 /* When "need_clear_subexpr" is set we don't need to save the values, only
5473 * remember that this flag needs to be set again when restoring. */
5474 bp->save_need_clear_subexpr = need_clear_subexpr;
5475 if (!need_clear_subexpr) {
5476 for (i = 0; i < NSUBEXP10; ++i) {
5477 if (REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0))) {
5478 bp->save_start[i].se_u.pos = reg_startpos[i];
5479 bp->save_end[i].se_u.pos = reg_endpos[i];
5480 } else {
5481 bp->save_start[i].se_u.ptr = reg_startp[i];
5482 bp->save_end[i].se_u.ptr = reg_endp[i];
5483 }
5484 }
5485 }
5486}
5487
5488/*
5489 * Restore the subexpr from "bp".
5490 */
5491static void restore_subexpr(regbehind_T *bp)
5492{
5493 int i;
5494
5495 /* Only need to restore saved values when they are not to be cleared. */
5496 need_clear_subexpr = bp->save_need_clear_subexpr;
5497 if (!need_clear_subexpr) {
5498 for (i = 0; i < NSUBEXP10; ++i) {
5499 if (REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0))) {
5500 reg_startpos[i] = bp->save_start[i].se_u.pos;
5501 reg_endpos[i] = bp->save_end[i].se_u.pos;
5502 } else {
5503 reg_startp[i] = bp->save_start[i].se_u.ptr;
5504 reg_endp[i] = bp->save_end[i].se_u.ptr;
5505 }
5506 }
5507 }
5508}
5509
5510/*
5511 * Advance reglnum, regline and reginput to the next line.
5512 */
5513static void reg_nextline(void)
5514{
5515 regline = reg_getline(++reglnum);
5516 reginput = regline;
5517 fast_breakcheck();
5518}
5519
5520/*
5521 * Save the input line and position in a regsave_T.
5522 */
5523static void reg_save(regsave_T *save, garray_T *gap)
5524{
5525 if (REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0))) {
5526 save->rs_u.pos.col = (colnr_T)(reginput - regline);
5527 save->rs_u.pos.lnum = reglnum;
5528 } else
5529 save->rs_u.ptr = reginput;
5530 save->rs_len = gap->ga_len;
5531}
5532
5533/*
5534 * Restore the input line and position from a regsave_T.
5535 */
5536static void reg_restore(regsave_T *save, garray_T *gap)
5537{
5538 if (REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0))) {
5539 if (reglnum != save->rs_u.pos.lnum) {
5540 /* only call reg_getline() when the line number changed to save
5541 * a bit of time */
5542 reglnum = save->rs_u.pos.lnum;
5543 regline = reg_getline(reglnum);
5544 }
5545 reginput = regline + save->rs_u.pos.col;
5546 } else
5547 reginput = save->rs_u.ptr;
5548 gap->ga_len = save->rs_len;
5549}
5550
5551/*
5552 * Return TRUE if current position is equal to saved position.
5553 */
5554static int reg_save_equal(regsave_T *save)
5555{
5556 if (REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0)))
5557 return reglnum == save->rs_u.pos.lnum
5558 && reginput == regline + save->rs_u.pos.col;
5559 return reginput == save->rs_u.ptr;
5560}
5561
5562/*
5563 * Tentatively set the sub-expression start to the current position (after
5564 * calling regmatch() they will have changed). Need to save the existing
5565 * values for when there is no match.
5566 * Use se_save() to use pointer (save_se_multi()) or position (save_se_one()),
5567 * depending on REG_MULTI.
5568 */
5569static void save_se_multi(save_se_T *savep, lpos_T *posp)
5570{
5571 savep->se_u.pos = *posp;
5572 posp->lnum = reglnum;
5573 posp->col = (colnr_T)(reginput - regline);
5574}
5575
5576static void save_se_one(save_se_T *savep, char_u **pp)
5577{
5578 savep->se_u.ptr = *pp;
5579 *pp = reginput;
5580}
5581
5582/*
5583 * Compare a number with the operand of RE_LNUM, RE_COL or RE_VCOL.
5584 */
5585static int re_num_cmp(long_u val, char_u *scan)
5586{
5587 long_u n = OPERAND_MIN(scan)(((long)(scan)[3] << 24) + ((long)(scan)[4] << 16
) + ((long)(scan)[5] << 8) + (long)(scan)[6]);
5588
5589 if (OPERAND_CMP(scan)(scan)[7] == '>')
5590 return val > n;
5591 if (OPERAND_CMP(scan)(scan)[7] == '<')
5592 return val < n;
5593 return val == n;
5594}
5595
5596/*
5597 * Check whether a backreference matches.
5598 * Returns RA_FAIL, RA_NOMATCH or RA_MATCH.
5599 * If "bytelen" is not NULL, it is set to the byte length of the match in the
5600 * last line.
5601 */
5602static int match_with_backref(linenr_T start_lnum, colnr_T start_col, linenr_T end_lnum, colnr_T end_col, int *bytelen)
5603{
5604 linenr_T clnum = start_lnum;
5605 colnr_T ccol = start_col;
5606 int len;
5607 char_u *p;
5608
5609 if (bytelen != NULL((void*)0))
5610 *bytelen = 0;
5611 for (;; ) {
5612 /* Since getting one line may invalidate the other, need to make copy.
5613 * Slow! */
5614 if (regline != reg_tofree) {
5615 len = (int)STRLEN(regline)strlen((char *)(regline));
5616 if (reg_tofree == NULL((void*)0) || len >= (int)reg_tofreelen) {
5617 len += 50; /* get some extra */
5618 free(reg_tofree);
5619 reg_tofree = xmalloc(len);
5620 reg_tofreelen = len;
5621 }
5622 STRCPY(reg_tofree, regline)strcpy((char *)(reg_tofree), (char *)(regline));
5623 reginput = reg_tofree + (reginput - regline);
5624 regline = reg_tofree;
5625 }
5626
5627 /* Get the line to compare with. */
5628 p = reg_getline(clnum);
5629 if (clnum == end_lnum)
5630 len = end_col - ccol;
5631 else
5632 len = (int)STRLEN(p + ccol)strlen((char *)(p + ccol));
5633
5634 if (cstrncmp(p + ccol, reginput, &len) != 0)
5635 return RA_NOMATCH5; /* doesn't match */
5636 if (bytelen != NULL((void*)0))
5637 *bytelen += len;
5638 if (clnum == end_lnum)
5639 break; /* match and at end! */
5640 if (reglnum >= reg_maxline)
5641 return RA_NOMATCH5; /* text too short */
5642
5643 /* Advance to next line. */
5644 reg_nextline();
5645 if (bytelen != NULL((void*)0))
5646 *bytelen = 0;
5647 ++clnum;
5648 ccol = 0;
5649 if (got_int)
5650 return RA_FAIL1;
5651 }
5652
5653 /* found a match! Note that regline may now point to a copy of the line,
5654 * that should not matter. */
5655 return RA_MATCH4;
5656}
5657
5658#ifdef BT_REGEXP_DUMP
5659
5660/*
5661 * regdump - dump a regexp onto stdout in vaguely comprehensible form
5662 */
5663static void regdump(char_u *pattern, bt_regprog_T *r)
5664{
5665 char_u *s;
5666 int op = EXACTLY5; /* Arbitrary non-END op. */
5667 char_u *next;
5668 char_u *end = NULL((void*)0);
5669 FILE *f;
5670
5671#ifdef BT_REGEXP_LOG
5672 f = fopen("bt_regexp_log.log", "a");
5673#else
5674 f = stdoutstdout;
5675#endif
5676 if (f == NULL((void*)0))
5677 return;
5678 fprintf(f, "-------------------------------------\n\r\nregcomp(%s):\r\n",
5679 pattern);
5680
5681 s = r->program + 1;
5682 /*
5683 * Loop until we find the END that isn't before a referred next (an END
5684 * can also appear in a NOMATCH operand).
5685 */
5686 while (op != END0 || s <= end) {
5687 op = OP(s)((int)*(s));
5688 fprintf(f, "%2d%s", (int)(s - r->program), regprop(s)); /* Where, what. */
5689 next = regnext(s);
5690 if (next == NULL((void*)0)) /* Next ptr. */
5691 fprintf(f, "(0)");
5692 else
5693 fprintf(f, "(%d)", (int)((s - r->program) + (next - s)));
5694 if (end < next)
5695 end = next;
5696 if (op == BRACE_LIMITS17) {
5697 /* Two ints */
5698 fprintf(f, " minval %" PRId64"l" "d" ", maxval %" PRId64"l" "d",
5699 (int64_t)OPERAND_MIN(s)(((long)(s)[3] << 24) + ((long)(s)[4] << 16) + ((
long)(s)[5] << 8) + (long)(s)[6]), (int64_t)OPERAND_MAX(s)(((long)((s) + 4)[3] << 24) + ((long)((s) + 4)[4] <<
16) + ((long)((s) + 4)[5] << 8) + (long)((s) + 4)[6]));
5700 s += 8;
5701 } else if (op == BEHIND11 || op == NOBEHIND12) {
5702 /* one int */
5703 fprintf(f, " count %" PRId64"l" "d", (int64_t)OPERAND_MIN(s)(((long)(s)[3] << 24) + ((long)(s)[4] << 16) + ((
long)(s)[5] << 8) + (long)(s)[6]));
5704 s += 4;
5705 } else if (op == RE_LNUM204 || op == RE_COL205 || op == RE_VCOL206) {
5706 /* one int plus comperator */
5707 fprintf(f, " count %" PRId64"l" "d", (int64_t)OPERAND_MIN(s)(((long)(s)[3] << 24) + ((long)(s)[4] << 16) + ((
long)(s)[5] << 8) + (long)(s)[6]));
5708 s += 5;
5709 }
5710 s += 3;
5711 if (op == ANYOF21 || op == ANYOF21 + ADD_NL30
5712 || op == ANYBUT22 || op == ANYBUT22 + ADD_NL30
5713 || op == EXACTLY5) {
5714 /* Literal string, where present. */
5715 fprintf(f, "\nxxxxxxxxx\n");
5716 while (*s != NUL'\000')
5717 fprintf(f, "%c", *s++);
5718 fprintf(f, "\nxxxxxxxxx\n");
5719 s++;
5720 }
5721 fprintf(f, "\r\n");
5722 }
5723
5724 /* Header fields of interest. */
5725 if (r->regstart != NUL'\000')
5726 fprintf(f, "start `%s' 0x%x; ", r->regstart < 256
5727 ? (char *)transchar(r->regstart)
5728 : "multibyte", r->regstart);
5729 if (r->reganch)
5730 fprintf(f, "anchored; ");
5731 if (r->regmust != NULL((void*)0))
5732 fprintf(f, "must have \"%s\"", r->regmust);
5733 fprintf(f, "\r\n");
5734
5735#ifdef BT_REGEXP_LOG
5736 fclose(f);
5737#endif
5738}
5739#endif /* BT_REGEXP_DUMP */
5740
5741#ifdef REGEXP_DEBUG
5742/*
5743 * regprop - printable representation of opcode
5744 */
5745static char_u *regprop(char_u *op)
5746{
5747 char *p;
5748 static char buf[50];
5749
5750 STRCPY(buf, ":")strcpy((char *)(buf), (char *)(":"));
5751
5752 switch ((int) OP(op)((int)*(op))) {
5753 case BOL1:
5754 p = "BOL";
5755 break;
5756 case EOL2:
5757 p = "EOL";
5758 break;
5759 case RE_BOF201:
5760 p = "BOF";
5761 break;
5762 case RE_EOF202:
5763 p = "EOF";
5764 break;
5765 case CURSOR203:
5766 p = "CURSOR";
5767 break;
5768 case RE_VISUAL208:
5769 p = "RE_VISUAL";
5770 break;
5771 case RE_LNUM204:
5772 p = "RE_LNUM";
5773 break;
5774 case RE_MARK207:
5775 p = "RE_MARK";
5776 break;
5777 case RE_COL205:
5778 p = "RE_COL";
5779 break;
5780 case RE_VCOL206:
5781 p = "RE_VCOL";
5782 break;
5783 case BOW15:
5784 p = "BOW";
5785 break;
5786 case EOW16:
5787 p = "EOW";
5788 break;
5789 case ANY20:
5790 p = "ANY";
5791 break;
5792 case ANY20 + ADD_NL30:
5793 p = "ANY+NL";
5794 break;
5795 case ANYOF21:
5796 p = "ANYOF";
5797 break;
5798 case ANYOF21 + ADD_NL30:
5799 p = "ANYOF+NL";
5800 break;
5801 case ANYBUT22:
5802 p = "ANYBUT";
5803 break;
5804 case ANYBUT22 + ADD_NL30:
5805 p = "ANYBUT+NL";
5806 break;
5807 case IDENT23:
5808 p = "IDENT";
5809 break;
5810 case IDENT23 + ADD_NL30:
5811 p = "IDENT+NL";
5812 break;
5813 case SIDENT24:
5814 p = "SIDENT";
5815 break;
5816 case SIDENT24 + ADD_NL30:
5817 p = "SIDENT+NL";
5818 break;
5819 case KWORD25:
5820 p = "KWORD";
5821 break;
5822 case KWORD25 + ADD_NL30:
5823 p = "KWORD+NL";
5824 break;
5825 case SKWORD26:
5826 p = "SKWORD";
5827 break;
5828 case SKWORD26 + ADD_NL30:
5829 p = "SKWORD+NL";
5830 break;
5831 case FNAME27:
5832 p = "FNAME";
5833 break;
5834 case FNAME27 + ADD_NL30:
5835 p = "FNAME+NL";
5836 break;
5837 case SFNAME28:
5838 p = "SFNAME";
5839 break;
5840 case SFNAME28 + ADD_NL30:
5841 p = "SFNAME+NL";
5842 break;
5843 case PRINT29:
5844 p = "PRINT";
5845 break;
5846 case PRINT29 + ADD_NL30:
5847 p = "PRINT+NL";
5848 break;
5849 case SPRINT30:
5850 p = "SPRINT";
5851 break;
5852 case SPRINT30 + ADD_NL30:
5853 p = "SPRINT+NL";
5854 break;
5855 case WHITE31:
5856 p = "WHITE";
5857 break;
5858 case WHITE31 + ADD_NL30:
5859 p = "WHITE+NL";
5860 break;
5861 case NWHITE32:
5862 p = "NWHITE";
5863 break;
5864 case NWHITE32 + ADD_NL30:
5865 p = "NWHITE+NL";
5866 break;
5867 case DIGIT33:
5868 p = "DIGIT";
5869 break;
5870 case DIGIT33 + ADD_NL30:
5871 p = "DIGIT+NL";
5872 break;
5873 case NDIGIT34:
5874 p = "NDIGIT";
5875 break;
5876 case NDIGIT34 + ADD_NL30:
5877 p = "NDIGIT+NL";
5878 break;
5879 case HEX35:
5880 p = "HEX";
5881 break;
5882 case HEX35 + ADD_NL30:
5883 p = "HEX+NL";
5884 break;
5885 case NHEX36:
5886 p = "NHEX";
5887 break;
5888 case NHEX36 + ADD_NL30:
5889 p = "NHEX+NL";
5890 break;
5891 case OCTAL37:
5892 p = "OCTAL";
5893 break;
5894 case OCTAL37 + ADD_NL30:
5895 p = "OCTAL+NL";
5896 break;
5897 case NOCTAL38:
5898 p = "NOCTAL";
5899 break;
5900 case NOCTAL38 + ADD_NL30:
5901 p = "NOCTAL+NL";
5902 break;
5903 case WORD39:
5904 p = "WORD";
5905 break;
5906 case WORD39 + ADD_NL30:
5907 p = "WORD+NL";
5908 break;
5909 case NWORD40:
5910 p = "NWORD";
5911 break;
5912 case NWORD40 + ADD_NL30:
5913 p = "NWORD+NL";
5914 break;
5915 case HEAD41:
5916 p = "HEAD";
5917 break;
5918 case HEAD41 + ADD_NL30:
5919 p = "HEAD+NL";
5920 break;
5921 case NHEAD42:
5922 p = "NHEAD";
5923 break;
5924 case NHEAD42 + ADD_NL30:
5925 p = "NHEAD+NL";
5926 break;
5927 case ALPHA43:
5928 p = "ALPHA";
5929 break;
5930 case ALPHA43 + ADD_NL30:
5931 p = "ALPHA+NL";
5932 break;
5933 case NALPHA44:
5934 p = "NALPHA";
5935 break;
5936 case NALPHA44 + ADD_NL30:
5937 p = "NALPHA+NL";
5938 break;
5939 case LOWER45:
5940 p = "LOWER";
5941 break;
5942 case LOWER45 + ADD_NL30:
5943 p = "LOWER+NL";
5944 break;
5945 case NLOWER46:
5946 p = "NLOWER";
5947 break;
5948 case NLOWER46 + ADD_NL30:
5949 p = "NLOWER+NL";
5950 break;
5951 case UPPER47:
5952 p = "UPPER";
5953 break;
5954 case UPPER47 + ADD_NL30:
5955 p = "UPPER+NL";
5956 break;
5957 case NUPPER48:
5958 p = "NUPPER";
5959 break;
5960 case NUPPER48 + ADD_NL30:
5961 p = "NUPPER+NL";
5962 break;
5963 case BRANCH3:
5964 p = "BRANCH";
5965 break;
5966 case EXACTLY5:
5967 p = "EXACTLY";
5968 break;
5969 case NOTHING6:
5970 p = "NOTHING";
5971 break;
5972 case BACK4:
5973 p = "BACK";
5974 break;
5975 case END0:
5976 p = "END";
5977 break;
5978 case MOPEN80 + 0:
5979 p = "MATCH START";
5980 break;
5981 case MOPEN80 + 1:
5982 case MOPEN80 + 2:
5983 case MOPEN80 + 3:
5984 case MOPEN80 + 4:
5985 case MOPEN80 + 5:
5986 case MOPEN80 + 6:
5987 case MOPEN80 + 7:
5988 case MOPEN80 + 8:
5989 case MOPEN80 + 9:
5990 sprintf(buf + STRLEN(buf)strlen((char *)(buf)), "MOPEN%d", OP(op)((int)*(op)) - MOPEN80);
5991 p = NULL((void*)0);
5992 break;
5993 case MCLOSE90 + 0:
5994 p = "MATCH END";
5995 break;
5996 case MCLOSE90 + 1:
5997 case MCLOSE90 + 2:
5998 case MCLOSE90 + 3:
5999 case MCLOSE90 + 4:
6000 case MCLOSE90 + 5:
6001 case MCLOSE90 + 6:
6002 case MCLOSE90 + 7:
6003 case MCLOSE90 + 8:
6004 case MCLOSE90 + 9:
6005 sprintf(buf + STRLEN(buf)strlen((char *)(buf)), "MCLOSE%d", OP(op)((int)*(op)) - MCLOSE90);
6006 p = NULL((void*)0);
6007 break;
6008 case BACKREF100 + 1:
6009 case BACKREF100 + 2:
6010 case BACKREF100 + 3:
6011 case BACKREF100 + 4:
6012 case BACKREF100 + 5:
6013 case BACKREF100 + 6:
6014 case BACKREF100 + 7:
6015 case BACKREF100 + 8:
6016 case BACKREF100 + 9:
6017 sprintf(buf + STRLEN(buf)strlen((char *)(buf)), "BACKREF%d", OP(op)((int)*(op)) - BACKREF100);
6018 p = NULL((void*)0);
6019 break;
6020 case NOPEN150:
6021 p = "NOPEN";
6022 break;
6023 case NCLOSE151:
6024 p = "NCLOSE";
6025 break;
6026 case ZOPEN110 + 1:
6027 case ZOPEN110 + 2:
6028 case ZOPEN110 + 3:
6029 case ZOPEN110 + 4:
6030 case ZOPEN110 + 5:
6031 case ZOPEN110 + 6:
6032 case ZOPEN110 + 7:
6033 case ZOPEN110 + 8:
6034 case ZOPEN110 + 9:
6035 sprintf(buf + STRLEN(buf)strlen((char *)(buf)), "ZOPEN%d", OP(op)((int)*(op)) - ZOPEN110);
6036 p = NULL((void*)0);
6037 break;
6038 case ZCLOSE120 + 1:
6039 case ZCLOSE120 + 2:
6040 case ZCLOSE120 + 3:
6041 case ZCLOSE120 + 4:
6042 case ZCLOSE120 + 5:
6043 case ZCLOSE120 + 6:
6044 case ZCLOSE120 + 7:
6045 case ZCLOSE120 + 8:
6046 case ZCLOSE120 + 9:
6047 sprintf(buf + STRLEN(buf)strlen((char *)(buf)), "ZCLOSE%d", OP(op)((int)*(op)) - ZCLOSE120);
6048 p = NULL((void*)0);
6049 break;
6050 case ZREF130 + 1:
6051 case ZREF130 + 2:
6052 case ZREF130 + 3:
6053 case ZREF130 + 4:
6054 case ZREF130 + 5:
6055 case ZREF130 + 6:
6056 case ZREF130 + 7:
6057 case ZREF130 + 8:
6058 case ZREF130 + 9:
6059 sprintf(buf + STRLEN(buf)strlen((char *)(buf)), "ZREF%d", OP(op)((int)*(op)) - ZREF130);
6060 p = NULL((void*)0);
6061 break;
6062 case STAR7:
6063 p = "STAR";
6064 break;
6065 case PLUS8:
6066 p = "PLUS";
6067 break;
6068 case NOMATCH10:
6069 p = "NOMATCH";
6070 break;
6071 case MATCH9:
6072 p = "MATCH";
6073 break;
6074 case BEHIND11:
6075 p = "BEHIND";
6076 break;
6077 case NOBEHIND12:
6078 p = "NOBEHIND";
6079 break;
6080 case SUBPAT13:
6081 p = "SUBPAT";
6082 break;
6083 case BRACE_LIMITS17:
6084 p = "BRACE_LIMITS";
6085 break;
6086 case BRACE_SIMPLE14:
6087 p = "BRACE_SIMPLE";
6088 break;
6089 case BRACE_COMPLEX140 + 0:
6090 case BRACE_COMPLEX140 + 1:
6091 case BRACE_COMPLEX140 + 2:
6092 case BRACE_COMPLEX140 + 3:
6093 case BRACE_COMPLEX140 + 4:
6094 case BRACE_COMPLEX140 + 5:
6095 case BRACE_COMPLEX140 + 6:
6096 case BRACE_COMPLEX140 + 7:
6097 case BRACE_COMPLEX140 + 8:
6098 case BRACE_COMPLEX140 + 9:
6099 sprintf(buf + STRLEN(buf)strlen((char *)(buf)), "BRACE_COMPLEX%d", OP(op)((int)*(op)) - BRACE_COMPLEX140);
6100 p = NULL((void*)0);
6101 break;
6102 case MULTIBYTECODE200:
6103 p = "MULTIBYTECODE";
6104 break;
6105 case NEWL18:
6106 p = "NEWL";
6107 break;
6108 default:
6109 sprintf(buf + STRLEN(buf)strlen((char *)(buf)), "corrupt %d", OP(op)((int)*(op)));
6110 p = NULL((void*)0);
6111 break;
6112 }
6113 if (p != NULL((void*)0))
6114 STRCAT(buf, p)strcat((char *)(buf), (char *)(p));
6115 return (char_u *)buf;
6116}
6117#endif /* REGEXP_DEBUG */
6118
6119
6120
6121/* 0xfb20 - 0xfb4f */
6122static decomp_T decomp_table[0xfb4f-0xfb20+1] =
6123{
6124 {0x5e2,0,0}, /* 0xfb20 alt ayin */
6125 {0x5d0,0,0}, /* 0xfb21 alt alef */
6126 {0x5d3,0,0}, /* 0xfb22 alt dalet */
6127 {0x5d4,0,0}, /* 0xfb23 alt he */
6128 {0x5db,0,0}, /* 0xfb24 alt kaf */
6129 {0x5dc,0,0}, /* 0xfb25 alt lamed */
6130 {0x5dd,0,0}, /* 0xfb26 alt mem-sofit */
6131 {0x5e8,0,0}, /* 0xfb27 alt resh */
6132 {0x5ea,0,0}, /* 0xfb28 alt tav */
6133 {'+', 0, 0}, /* 0xfb29 alt plus */
6134 {0x5e9, 0x5c1, 0}, /* 0xfb2a shin+shin-dot */
6135 {0x5e9, 0x5c2, 0}, /* 0xfb2b shin+sin-dot */
6136 {0x5e9, 0x5c1, 0x5bc}, /* 0xfb2c shin+shin-dot+dagesh */
6137 {0x5e9, 0x5c2, 0x5bc}, /* 0xfb2d shin+sin-dot+dagesh */
6138 {0x5d0, 0x5b7, 0}, /* 0xfb2e alef+patah */
6139 {0x5d0, 0x5b8, 0}, /* 0xfb2f alef+qamats */
6140 {0x5d0, 0x5b4, 0}, /* 0xfb30 alef+hiriq */
6141 {0x5d1, 0x5bc, 0}, /* 0xfb31 bet+dagesh */
6142 {0x5d2, 0x5bc, 0}, /* 0xfb32 gimel+dagesh */
6143 {0x5d3, 0x5bc, 0}, /* 0xfb33 dalet+dagesh */
6144 {0x5d4, 0x5bc, 0}, /* 0xfb34 he+dagesh */
6145 {0x5d5, 0x5bc, 0}, /* 0xfb35 vav+dagesh */
6146 {0x5d6, 0x5bc, 0}, /* 0xfb36 zayin+dagesh */
6147 {0xfb37, 0, 0}, /* 0xfb37 -- */
6148 {0x5d8, 0x5bc, 0}, /* 0xfb38 tet+dagesh */
6149 {0x5d9, 0x5bc, 0}, /* 0xfb39 yud+dagesh */
6150 {0x5da, 0x5bc, 0}, /* 0xfb3a kaf sofit+dagesh */
6151 {0x5db, 0x5bc, 0}, /* 0xfb3b kaf+dagesh */
6152 {0x5dc, 0x5bc, 0}, /* 0xfb3c lamed+dagesh */
6153 {0xfb3d, 0, 0}, /* 0xfb3d -- */
6154 {0x5de, 0x5bc, 0}, /* 0xfb3e mem+dagesh */
6155 {0xfb3f, 0, 0}, /* 0xfb3f -- */
6156 {0x5e0, 0x5bc, 0}, /* 0xfb40 nun+dagesh */
6157 {0x5e1, 0x5bc, 0}, /* 0xfb41 samech+dagesh */
6158 {0xfb42, 0, 0}, /* 0xfb42 -- */
6159 {0x5e3, 0x5bc, 0}, /* 0xfb43 pe sofit+dagesh */
6160 {0x5e4, 0x5bc,0}, /* 0xfb44 pe+dagesh */
6161 {0xfb45, 0, 0}, /* 0xfb45 -- */
6162 {0x5e6, 0x5bc, 0}, /* 0xfb46 tsadi+dagesh */
6163 {0x5e7, 0x5bc, 0}, /* 0xfb47 qof+dagesh */
6164 {0x5e8, 0x5bc, 0}, /* 0xfb48 resh+dagesh */
6165 {0x5e9, 0x5bc, 0}, /* 0xfb49 shin+dagesh */
6166 {0x5ea, 0x5bc, 0}, /* 0xfb4a tav+dagesh */
6167 {0x5d5, 0x5b9, 0}, /* 0xfb4b vav+holam */
6168 {0x5d1, 0x5bf, 0}, /* 0xfb4c bet+rafe */
6169 {0x5db, 0x5bf, 0}, /* 0xfb4d kaf+rafe */
6170 {0x5e4, 0x5bf, 0}, /* 0xfb4e pe+rafe */
6171 {0x5d0, 0x5dc, 0} /* 0xfb4f alef-lamed */
6172};
6173
6174static void mb_decompose(int c, int *c1, int *c2, int *c3)
6175{
6176 decomp_T d;
6177
6178 if (c >= 0xfb20 && c <= 0xfb4f) {
6179 d = decomp_table[c - 0xfb20];
6180 *c1 = d.a;
6181 *c2 = d.b;
6182 *c3 = d.c;
6183 } else {
6184 *c1 = c;
6185 *c2 = *c3 = 0;
6186 }
6187}
6188
6189/*
6190 * Compare two strings, ignore case if ireg_ic set.
6191 * Return 0 if strings match, non-zero otherwise.
6192 * Correct the length "*n" when composing characters are ignored.
6193 */
6194static int cstrncmp(char_u *s1, char_u *s2, int *n)
6195{
6196 int result;
6197
6198 if (!ireg_ic)
6199 result = STRNCMP(s1, s2, *n)strncmp((char *)(s1), (char *)(s2), (size_t)(*n));
6200 else
6201 result = MB_STRNICMP(s1, s2, *n)mb_strnicmp((char_u *)(s1), (char_u *)(s2), (int)(*n));
6202
6203 /* if it failed and it's utf8 and we want to combineignore: */
6204 if (result != 0 && enc_utf8 && ireg_icombine) {
6205 char_u *str1, *str2;
6206 int c1, c2, c11, c12;
6207 int junk;
6208
6209 /* we have to handle the strcmp ourselves, since it is necessary to
6210 * deal with the composing characters by ignoring them: */
6211 str1 = s1;
6212 str2 = s2;
6213 c1 = c2 = 0;
6214 while ((int)(str1 - s1) < *n) {
6215 c1 = mb_ptr2char_adv(&str1);
6216 c2 = mb_ptr2char_adv(&str2);
6217
6218 /* decompose the character if necessary, into 'base' characters
6219 * because I don't care about Arabic, I will hard-code the Hebrew
6220 * which I *do* care about! So sue me... */
6221 if (c1 != c2 && (!ireg_ic || utf_fold(c1) != utf_fold(c2))) {
6222 /* decomposition necessary? */
6223 mb_decompose(c1, &c11, &junk, &junk);
6224 mb_decompose(c2, &c12, &junk, &junk);
6225 c1 = c11;
6226 c2 = c12;
6227 if (c11 != c12 && (!ireg_ic || utf_fold(c11) != utf_fold(c12)))
6228 break;
6229 }
6230 }
6231 result = c2 - c1;
6232 if (result == 0)
6233 *n = (int)(str2 - s2);
6234 }
6235
6236 return result;
6237}
6238
6239/*
6240 * cstrchr: This function is used a lot for simple searches, keep it fast!
6241 */
6242static char_u *cstrchr(char_u *s, int c)
6243{
6244 char_u *p;
6245 int cc;
6246
6247 if (!ireg_ic
6248 || (!enc_utf8 && mb_char2len(c) > 1)
6249 )
6250 return vim_strchr(s, c);
6251
6252 /* tolower() and toupper() can be slow, comparing twice should be a lot
6253 * faster (esp. when using MS Visual C++!).
6254 * For UTF-8 need to use folded case. */
6255 if (enc_utf8 && c > 0x80)
6256 cc = utf_fold(c);
6257 else if (vim_isupper(c))
6258 cc = vim_tolower(c);
6259 else if (vim_islower(c))
6260 cc = vim_toupper(c);
6261 else
6262 return vim_strchr(s, c);
6263
6264 if (has_mbyte) {
6265 for (p = s; *p != NUL'\000'; p += (*mb_ptr2len)(p)) {
6266 if (enc_utf8 && c > 0x80) {
6267 if (utf_fold(utf_ptr2char(p)) == cc)
6268 return p;
6269 } else if (*p == c || *p == cc)
6270 return p;
6271 }
6272 } else
6273 /* Faster version for when there are no multi-byte characters. */
6274 for (p = s; *p != NUL'\000'; ++p)
6275 if (*p == c || *p == cc)
6276 return p;
6277
6278 return NULL((void*)0);
6279}
6280
6281/***************************************************************
6282* regsub stuff *
6283***************************************************************/
6284
6285/* This stuff below really confuses cc on an SGI -- webb */
6286
6287
6288
6289static fptr_T do_upper(int *d, int c)
6290{
6291 *d = vim_toupper(c);
6292
6293 return (fptr_T)NULL((void*)0);
6294}
6295
6296static fptr_T do_Upper(int *d, int c)
6297{
6298 *d = vim_toupper(c);
6299
6300 return (fptr_T)do_Upper;
6301}
6302
6303static fptr_T do_lower(int *d, int c)
6304{
6305 *d = vim_tolower(c);
6306
6307 return (fptr_T)NULL((void*)0);
6308}
6309
6310static fptr_T do_Lower(int *d, int c)
6311{
6312 *d = vim_tolower(c);
6313
6314 return (fptr_T)do_Lower;
6315}
6316
6317/*
6318 * regtilde(): Replace tildes in the pattern by the old pattern.
6319 *
6320 * Short explanation of the tilde: It stands for the previous replacement
6321 * pattern. If that previous pattern also contains a ~ we should go back a
6322 * step further... But we insert the previous pattern into the current one
6323 * and remember that.
6324 * This still does not handle the case where "magic" changes. So require the
6325 * user to keep his hands off of "magic".
6326 *
6327 * The tildes are parsed once before the first call to vim_regsub().
6328 */
6329char_u *regtilde(char_u *source, int magic)
6330{
6331 char_u *newsub = source;
6332 char_u *tmpsub;
6333 char_u *p;
6334 int len;
6335 int prevlen;
6336
6337 for (p = newsub; *p; ++p) {
6338 if ((*p == '~' && magic) || (*p == '\\' && *(p + 1) == '~' && !magic)) {
6339 if (reg_prev_sub != NULL((void*)0)) {
6340 /* length = len(newsub) - 1 + len(prev_sub) + 1 */
6341 prevlen = (int)STRLEN(reg_prev_sub)strlen((char *)(reg_prev_sub));
6342 tmpsub = xmalloc(STRLEN(newsub)strlen((char *)(newsub)) + prevlen);
6343 /* copy prefix */
6344 len = (int)(p - newsub); /* not including ~ */
6345 memmove(tmpsub, newsub, (size_t)len);
6346 /* interpret tilde */
6347 memmove(tmpsub + len, reg_prev_sub, (size_t)prevlen);
6348 /* copy postfix */
6349 if (!magic)
6350 ++p; /* back off \ */
6351 STRCPY(tmpsub + len + prevlen, p + 1)strcpy((char *)(tmpsub + len + prevlen), (char *)(p + 1));
6352
6353 if (newsub != source) /* already allocated newsub */
6354 free(newsub);
6355 newsub = tmpsub;
6356 p = newsub + len + prevlen;
6357 } else if (magic)
6358 STRMOVE(p, p + 1)memmove((p), (p + 1), strlen((char *)(p + 1)) + 1); /* remove '~' */
6359 else
6360 STRMOVE(p, p + 2)memmove((p), (p + 2), strlen((char *)(p + 2)) + 1); /* remove '\~' */
6361 --p;
6362 } else {
6363 if (*p == '\\' && p[1]) /* skip escaped characters */
6364 ++p;
6365 if (has_mbyte)
6366 p += (*mb_ptr2len)(p) - 1;
6367 }
6368 }
6369
6370 free(reg_prev_sub);
6371 if (newsub != source) /* newsub was allocated, just keep it */
6372 reg_prev_sub = newsub;
6373 else /* no ~ found, need to save newsub */
6374 reg_prev_sub = vim_strsave(newsub);
6375 return newsub;
6376}
6377
6378static int can_f_submatch = FALSE0; /* TRUE when submatch() can be used */
6379
6380/* These pointers are used instead of reg_match and reg_mmatch for
6381 * reg_submatch(). Needed for when the substitution string is an expression
6382 * that contains a call to substitute() and submatch(). */
6383static regmatch_T *submatch_match;
6384static regmmatch_T *submatch_mmatch;
6385static linenr_T submatch_firstlnum;
6386static linenr_T submatch_maxline;
6387static int submatch_line_lbr;
6388
6389/*
6390 * vim_regsub() - perform substitutions after a vim_regexec() or
6391 * vim_regexec_multi() match.
6392 *
6393 * If "copy" is TRUE really copy into "dest".
6394 * If "copy" is FALSE nothing is copied, this is just to find out the length
6395 * of the result.
6396 *
6397 * If "backslash" is TRUE, a backslash will be removed later, need to double
6398 * them to keep them, and insert a backslash before a CR to avoid it being
6399 * replaced with a line break later.
6400 *
6401 * Note: The matched text must not change between the call of
6402 * vim_regexec()/vim_regexec_multi() and vim_regsub()! It would make the back
6403 * references invalid!
6404 *
6405 * Returns the size of the replacement, including terminating NUL.
6406 */
6407int vim_regsub(regmatch_T *rmp, char_u *source, char_u *dest, int copy, int magic, int backslash)
6408{
6409 reg_match = rmp;
6410 reg_mmatch = NULL((void*)0);
6411 reg_maxline = 0;
6412 reg_buf = curbuf;
6413 reg_line_lbr = TRUE1;
6414 return vim_regsub_both(source, dest, copy, magic, backslash);
6415}
6416
6417int vim_regsub_multi(regmmatch_T *rmp, linenr_T lnum, char_u *source, char_u *dest, int copy, int magic, int backslash)
6418{
6419 reg_match = NULL((void*)0);
6420 reg_mmatch = rmp;
6421 reg_buf = curbuf; /* always works on the current buffer! */
6422 reg_firstlnum = lnum;
6423 reg_maxline = curbuf->b_ml.ml_line_count - lnum;
6424 reg_line_lbr = FALSE0;
6425 return vim_regsub_both(source, dest, copy, magic, backslash);
6426}
6427
6428static int vim_regsub_both(char_u *source, char_u *dest, int copy, int magic, int backslash)
6429{
6430 char_u *src;
6431 char_u *dst;
6432 char_u *s;
6433 int c;
6434 int cc;
6435 int no = -1;
6436 fptr_T func_all = (fptr_T)NULL((void*)0);
6437 fptr_T func_one = (fptr_T)NULL((void*)0);
6438 linenr_T clnum = 0; /* init for GCC */
6439 int len = 0; /* init for GCC */
6440 static char_u *eval_result = NULL((void*)0);
6441
6442 /* Be paranoid... */
6443 if (source == NULL((void*)0) || dest == NULL((void*)0)) {
6444 EMSG(_(e_null))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_null))));
6445 return 0;
6446 }
6447 if (prog_magic_wrong())
6448 return 0;
6449 src = source;
6450 dst = dest;
6451
6452 /*
6453 * When the substitute part starts with "\=" evaluate it as an expression.
6454 */
6455 if (source[0] == '\\' && source[1] == '='
6456 && !can_f_submatch /* can't do this recursively */
6457 ) {
6458 /* To make sure that the length doesn't change between checking the
6459 * length and copying the string, and to speed up things, the
6460 * resulting string is saved from the call with "copy" == FALSE to the
6461 * call with "copy" == TRUE. */
6462 if (copy) {
6463 if (eval_result != NULL((void*)0)) {
6464 STRCPY(dest, eval_result)strcpy((char *)(dest), (char *)(eval_result));
6465 dst += STRLEN(eval_result)strlen((char *)(eval_result));
6466 free(eval_result);
6467 eval_result = NULL((void*)0);
6468 }
6469 } else {
6470 win_T *save_reg_win;
6471 int save_ireg_ic;
6472
6473 free(eval_result);
6474
6475 /* The expression may contain substitute(), which calls us
6476 * recursively. Make sure submatch() gets the text from the first
6477 * level. Don't need to save "reg_buf", because
6478 * vim_regexec_multi() can't be called recursively. */
6479 submatch_match = reg_match;
6480 submatch_mmatch = reg_mmatch;
6481 submatch_firstlnum = reg_firstlnum;
6482 submatch_maxline = reg_maxline;
6483 submatch_line_lbr = reg_line_lbr;
6484 save_reg_win = reg_win;
6485 save_ireg_ic = ireg_ic;
6486 can_f_submatch = TRUE1;
6487
6488 eval_result = eval_to_string(source + 2, NULL((void*)0), TRUE1);
6489 if (eval_result != NULL((void*)0)) {
6490 int had_backslash = FALSE0;
6491
6492 for (s = eval_result; *s != NUL'\000'; mb_ptr_adv(s)s += has_mbyte ? (*mb_ptr2len)(s) : 1) {
6493 /* Change NL to CR, so that it becomes a line break,
6494 * unless called from vim_regexec_nl().
6495 * Skip over a backslashed character. */
6496 if (*s == NL'\012' && !submatch_line_lbr)
6497 *s = CAR'\015';
6498 else if (*s == '\\' && s[1] != NUL'\000') {
6499 ++s;
6500 /* Change NL to CR here too, so that this works:
6501 * :s/abc\\\ndef/\="aaa\\\nbbb"/ on text:
6502 * abc\
6503 * def
6504 * Not when called from vim_regexec_nl().
6505 */
6506 if (*s == NL'\012' && !submatch_line_lbr)
6507 *s = CAR'\015';
6508 had_backslash = TRUE1;
6509 }
6510 }
6511 if (had_backslash && backslash) {
6512 /* Backslashes will be consumed, need to double them. */
6513 s = vim_strsave_escaped(eval_result, (char_u *)"\\");
6514 free(eval_result);
6515 eval_result = s;
6516 }
6517
6518 dst += STRLEN(eval_result)strlen((char *)(eval_result));
6519 }
6520
6521 reg_match = submatch_match;
6522 reg_mmatch = submatch_mmatch;
6523 reg_firstlnum = submatch_firstlnum;
6524 reg_maxline = submatch_maxline;
6525 reg_line_lbr = submatch_line_lbr;
6526 reg_win = save_reg_win;
6527 ireg_ic = save_ireg_ic;
6528 can_f_submatch = FALSE0;
6529 }
6530 } else
6531 while ((c = *src++) != NUL'\000') {
6532 if (c == '&' && magic)
6533 no = 0;
6534 else if (c == '\\' && *src != NUL'\000') {
6535 if (*src == '&' && !magic) {
6536 ++src;
6537 no = 0;
6538 } else if ('0' <= *src && *src <= '9') {
6539 no = *src++ - '0';
6540 } else if (vim_strchr((char_u *)"uUlLeE", *src)) {
6541 switch (*src++) {
6542 case 'u': func_one = (fptr_T)do_upper;
6543 continue;
6544 case 'U': func_all = (fptr_T)do_Upper;
6545 continue;
6546 case 'l': func_one = (fptr_T)do_lower;
6547 continue;
6548 case 'L': func_all = (fptr_T)do_Lower;
6549 continue;
6550 case 'e':
6551 case 'E': func_one = func_all = (fptr_T)NULL((void*)0);
6552 continue;
6553 }
6554 }
6555 }
6556 if (no < 0) { /* Ordinary character. */
6557 if (c == K_SPECIAL(0x80) && src[0] != NUL'\000' && src[1] != NUL'\000') {
6558 /* Copy a special key as-is. */
6559 if (copy) {
6560 *dst++ = c;
6561 *dst++ = *src++;
6562 *dst++ = *src++;
6563 } else {
6564 dst += 3;
6565 src += 2;
6566 }
6567 continue;
6568 }
6569
6570 if (c == '\\' && *src != NUL'\000') {
6571 /* Check for abbreviations -- webb */
6572 switch (*src) {
6573 case 'r': c = CAR'\015'; ++src; break;
6574 case 'n': c = NL'\012'; ++src; break;
6575 case 't': c = TAB'\011'; ++src; break;
6576 /* Oh no! \e already has meaning in subst pat :-( */
6577 /* case 'e': c = ESC; ++src; break; */
6578 case 'b': c = Ctrl_H8; ++src; break;
6579
6580 /* If "backslash" is TRUE the backslash will be removed
6581 * later. Used to insert a literal CR. */
6582 default: if (backslash) {
6583 if (copy)
6584 *dst = '\\';
6585 ++dst;
6586 }
6587 c = *src++;
6588 }
6589 } else if (has_mbyte)
6590 c = mb_ptr2char(src - 1);
6591
6592 /* Write to buffer, if copy is set. */
6593 if (func_one != (fptr_T)NULL((void*)0))
6594 /* Turbo C complains without the typecast */
6595 func_one = (fptr_T)(func_one(&cc, c));
6596 else if (func_all != (fptr_T)NULL((void*)0))
6597 /* Turbo C complains without the typecast */
6598 func_all = (fptr_T)(func_all(&cc, c));
6599 else /* just copy */
6600 cc = c;
6601
6602 if (has_mbyte) {
6603 int totlen = mb_ptr2len(src - 1);
6604
6605 if (copy)
6606 mb_char2bytes(cc, dst);
6607 dst += mb_char2len(cc) - 1;
6608 if (enc_utf8) {
6609 int clen = utf_ptr2len(src - 1);
6610
6611 /* If the character length is shorter than "totlen", there
6612 * are composing characters; copy them as-is. */
6613 if (clen < totlen) {
6614 if (copy)
6615 memmove(dst + 1, src - 1 + clen,
6616 (size_t)(totlen - clen));
6617 dst += totlen - clen;
6618 }
6619 }
6620 src += totlen - 1;
6621 } else if (copy)
6622 *dst = cc;
6623 dst++;
6624 } else {
6625 if (REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0))) {
6626 clnum = reg_mmatch->startpos[no].lnum;
6627 if (clnum < 0 || reg_mmatch->endpos[no].lnum < 0)
6628 s = NULL((void*)0);
6629 else {
6630 s = reg_getline(clnum) + reg_mmatch->startpos[no].col;
6631 if (reg_mmatch->endpos[no].lnum == clnum)
6632 len = reg_mmatch->endpos[no].col
6633 - reg_mmatch->startpos[no].col;
6634 else
6635 len = (int)STRLEN(s)strlen((char *)(s));
6636 }
6637 } else {
6638 s = reg_match->startp[no];
6639 if (reg_match->endp[no] == NULL((void*)0))
6640 s = NULL((void*)0);
6641 else
6642 len = (int)(reg_match->endp[no] - s);
6643 }
6644 if (s != NULL((void*)0)) {
6645 for (;; ) {
6646 if (len == 0) {
6647 if (REG_MULTI(reg_match == ((void*)0))) {
6648 if (reg_mmatch->endpos[no].lnum == clnum)
6649 break;
6650 if (copy)
6651 *dst = CAR'\015';
6652 ++dst;
6653 s = reg_getline(++clnum);
6654 if (reg_mmatch->endpos[no].lnum == clnum)
6655 len = reg_mmatch->endpos[no].col;
6656 else
6657 len = (int)STRLEN(s)strlen((char *)(s));
6658 } else
6659 break;
6660 } else if (*s == NUL'\000') { /* we hit NUL. */
6661 if (copy)
6662 EMSG(_(e_re_damg))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)(e_re_damg))));
6663 goto exit;
6664 } else {
6665 if (backslash && (*s == CAR'\015' || *s == '\\')) {
6666 /*
6667 * Insert a backslash in front of a CR, otherwise
6668 * it will be replaced by a line break.
6669 * Number of backslashes will be halved later,
6670 * double them here.
6671 */
6672 if (copy) {
6673 dst[0] = '\\';
6674 dst[1] = *s;
6675 }
6676 dst += 2;
6677 } else {
6678 if (has_mbyte)
6679 c = mb_ptr2char(s);
6680 else
6681 c = *s;
6682
6683 if (func_one != (fptr_T)NULL((void*)0))
6684 /* Turbo C complains without the typecast */
6685 func_one = (fptr_T)(func_one(&cc, c));
6686 else if (func_all != (fptr_T)NULL((void*)0))
6687 /* Turbo C complains without the typecast */
6688 func_all = (fptr_T)(func_all(&cc, c));
6689 else /* just copy */
6690 cc = c;
6691
6692 if (has_mbyte) {
6693 int l;
6694
6695 /* Copy composing characters separately, one
6696 * at a time. */
6697 if (enc_utf8)
6698 l = utf_ptr2len(s) - 1;
6699 else
6700 l = mb_ptr2len(s) - 1;
6701
6702 s += l;
6703 len -= l;
6704 if (copy)
6705 mb_char2bytes(cc, dst);
6706 dst += mb_char2len(cc) - 1;
6707 } else if (copy)
6708 *dst = cc;
6709 dst++;
6710 }
6711
6712 ++s;
6713 --len;
6714 }
6715 }
6716 }
6717 no = -1;
6718 }
6719 }
6720 if (copy)
6721 *dst = NUL'\000';
6722
6723exit:
6724 return (int)((dst - dest) + 1);
6725}
6726
6727
6728/*
6729 * Call reg_getline() with the line numbers from the submatch. If a
6730 * substitute() was used the reg_maxline and other values have been
6731 * overwritten.
6732 */
6733static char_u *reg_getline_submatch(linenr_T lnum)
6734{
6735 char_u *s;
6736 linenr_T save_first = reg_firstlnum;
6737 linenr_T save_max = reg_maxline;
6738
6739 reg_firstlnum = submatch_firstlnum;
6740 reg_maxline = submatch_maxline;
6741
6742 s = reg_getline(lnum);
6743
6744 reg_firstlnum = save_first;
6745 reg_maxline = save_max;
6746 return s;
6747}
6748
6749/*
6750 * Used for the submatch() function: get the string from the n'th submatch in
6751 * allocated memory.
6752 * Returns NULL when not in a ":s" command and for a non-existing submatch.
6753 */
6754char_u *reg_submatch(int no)
6755{
6756 char_u *retval = NULL((void*)0);
6757 char_u *s;
6758 int round;
6759 linenr_T lnum;
6760
6761 if (!can_f_submatch || no < 0)
6762 return NULL((void*)0);
6763
6764 if (submatch_match == NULL((void*)0)) {
6765 ssize_t len;
6766
6767 /*
6768 * First round: compute the length and allocate memory.
6769 * Second round: copy the text.
6770 */
6771 for (round = 1; round <= 2; ++round) {
6772 lnum = submatch_mmatch->startpos[no].lnum;
6773 if (lnum < 0 || submatch_mmatch->endpos[no].lnum < 0)
6774 return NULL((void*)0);
6775
6776 s = reg_getline_submatch(lnum) + submatch_mmatch->startpos[no].col;
6777 if (s == NULL((void*)0)) /* anti-crash check, cannot happen? */
6778 break;
6779 if (submatch_mmatch->endpos[no].lnum == lnum) {
6780 /* Within one line: take form start to end col. */
6781 len = submatch_mmatch->endpos[no].col
6782 - submatch_mmatch->startpos[no].col;
6783 if (round == 2)
6784 STRLCPY(retval, s, len + 1)xstrlcpy((char *)(retval), (char *)(s), (size_t)(len + 1));
6785 ++len;
6786 } else {
6787 /* Multiple lines: take start line from start col, middle
6788 * lines completely and end line up to end col. */
6789 len = STRLEN(s)strlen((char *)(s));
6790 if (round == 2) {
6791 STRCPY(retval, s)strcpy((char *)(retval), (char *)(s));
6792 retval[len] = '\n';
6793 }
6794 ++len;
6795 ++lnum;
6796 while (lnum < submatch_mmatch->endpos[no].lnum) {
6797 s = reg_getline_submatch(lnum++);
6798 if (round == 2)
6799 STRCPY(retval + len, s)strcpy((char *)(retval + len), (char *)(s));
6800 len += STRLEN(s)strlen((char *)(s));
6801 if (round == 2)
6802 retval[len] = '\n';
6803 ++len;
6804 }
6805 if (round == 2)
6806 STRNCPY(retval + len, reg_getline_submatch(lnum),strncpy((char *)(retval + len), (char *)(reg_getline_submatch
(lnum)), (size_t)(submatch_mmatch->endpos[no].col))
6807 submatch_mmatch->endpos[no].col)strncpy((char *)(retval + len), (char *)(reg_getline_submatch
(lnum)), (size_t)(submatch_mmatch->endpos[no].col));
6808 len += submatch_mmatch->endpos[no].col;
6809 if (round == 2)
6810 retval[len] = NUL'\000';
6811 ++len;
6812 }
6813
6814 if (retval == NULL((void*)0)) {
6815 retval = xmalloc(len);
6816 }
6817 }
6818 } else {
6819 s = submatch_match->startp[no];
6820 if (s == NULL((void*)0) || submatch_match->endp[no] == NULL((void*)0))
6821 retval = NULL((void*)0);
6822 else
6823 retval = vim_strnsave(s, (int)(submatch_match->endp[no] - s));
6824 }
6825
6826 return retval;
6827}
6828
6829// Used for the submatch() function with the optional non-zero argument: get
6830// the list of strings from the n'th submatch in allocated memory with NULs
6831// represented in NLs.
6832// Returns a list of allocated strings. Returns NULL when not in a ":s"
6833// command, for a non-existing submatch and for any error.
6834list_T *reg_submatch_list(int no)
6835{
6836 if (!can_f_submatch || no < 0) {
6837 return NULL((void*)0);
6838 }
6839
6840 linenr_T slnum;
6841 linenr_T elnum;
6842 list_T *list;
6843 char_u *s;
6844
6845 if (submatch_match == NULL((void*)0)) {
6846 slnum = submatch_mmatch->startpos[no].lnum;
6847 elnum = submatch_mmatch->endpos[no].lnum;
6848 if (slnum < 0 || elnum < 0) {
6849 return NULL((void*)0);
6850 }
6851
6852 colnr_T scol = submatch_mmatch->startpos[no].col;
6853 colnr_T ecol = submatch_mmatch->endpos[no].col;
6854
6855 list = list_alloc();
6856
6857 s = reg_getline_submatch(slnum) + scol;
6858 if (slnum == elnum) {
6859 list_append_string(list, s, ecol - scol);
6860 } else {
6861 list_append_string(list, s, -1);
6862 for (int i = 1; i < elnum - slnum; i++) {
6863 s = reg_getline_submatch(slnum + i);
6864 list_append_string(list, s, -1);
6865 }
6866 s = reg_getline_submatch(elnum);
6867 list_append_string(list, s, ecol);
6868 }
6869 } else {
6870 s = submatch_match->startp[no];
6871 if (s == NULL((void*)0) || submatch_match->endp[no] == NULL((void*)0)) {
6872 return NULL((void*)0);
6873 }
6874 list = list_alloc();
6875 list_append_string(list, s, (int)(submatch_match->endp[no] - s));
6876 }
6877
6878 return list;
6879}
6880
6881static regengine_T bt_regengine =
6882{
6883 bt_regcomp,
6884 bt_regfree,
6885 bt_regexec_nl,
6886 bt_regexec_multi
6887#ifdef REGEXP_DEBUG
6888 ,(char_u *)""
6889#endif
6890#ifdef DEBUG
6891 ,NULL((void*)0)
6892#endif
6893};
6894
6895
6896// XXX Do not allow headers generator to catch definitions from regexp_nfa.c
6897#ifndef DO_NOT_DEFINE_EMPTY_ATTRIBUTES
6898# include "nvim/regexp_nfa.c"
6899#endif
6900
6901static regengine_T nfa_regengine =
6902{
6903 nfa_regcomp,
6904 nfa_regfree,
6905 nfa_regexec_nl,
6906 nfa_regexec_multi
6907#ifdef REGEXP_DEBUG
6908 ,(char_u *)""
6909#endif
6910#ifdef DEBUG
6911 , NULL((void*)0)
6912#endif
6913};
6914
6915/* Which regexp engine to use? Needed for vim_regcomp().
6916 * Must match with 'regexpengine'. */
6917static int regexp_engine = 0;
6918#define AUTOMATIC_ENGINE0 0
6919#define BACKTRACKING_ENGINE1 1
6920#define NFA_ENGINE2 2
6921#ifdef REGEXP_DEBUG
6922static char_u regname[][30] = {
6923 "AUTOMATIC Regexp Engine",
6924 "BACKTRACKING Regexp Engine",
6925 "NFA Regexp Engine"
6926};
6927#endif
6928
6929/*
6930 * Compile a regular expression into internal code.
6931 * Returns the program in allocated memory.
6932 * Use vim_regfree() to free the memory.
6933 * Returns NULL for an error.
6934 */
6935regprog_T *vim_regcomp(char_u *expr_arg, int re_flags)
6936{
6937 regprog_T *prog = NULL((void*)0);
6938 char_u *expr = expr_arg;
6939
6940 regexp_engine = p_re;
6941
6942 /* Check for prefix "\%#=", that sets the regexp engine */
6943 if (STRNCMP(expr, "\\%#=", 4)strncmp((char *)(expr), (char *)("\\%#="), (size_t)(4)) == 0) {
6944 int newengine = expr[4] - '0';
6945
6946 if (newengine == AUTOMATIC_ENGINE0
6947 || newengine == BACKTRACKING_ENGINE1
6948 || newengine == NFA_ENGINE2) {
6949 regexp_engine = expr[4] - '0';
6950 expr += 5;
6951#ifdef REGEXP_DEBUG
6952 smsg((char_u *)"New regexp mode selected (%d): %s",
6953 regexp_engine,
6954 regname[newengine]);
6955#endif
6956 } else {
6957 EMSG(_(emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E864: \\%#= can only be followed by 0, 1, or 2. The automatic engine will be used "
))))
6958 "E864: \\%#= can only be followed by 0, 1, or 2. The automatic engine will be used "))emsg((char_u *)(gettext((char *)("E864: \\%#= can only be followed by 0, 1, or 2. The automatic engine will be used "
))));
6959 regexp_engine = AUTOMATIC_ENGINE0;
6960 }
6961 }
6962#ifdef REGEXP_DEBUG
6963 bt_regengine.expr = expr;
6964 nfa_regengine.expr = expr;
6965#endif
6966
6967 /*
6968 * First try the NFA engine, unless backtracking was requested.
6969 */
6970 if (regexp_engine != BACKTRACKING_ENGINE1)
6971 prog = nfa_regengine.regcomp(expr, re_flags);
6972 else
6973 prog = bt_regengine.regcomp(expr, re_flags);
6974
6975 if (prog == NULL((void*)0)) { /* error compiling regexp with initial engine */
6976#ifdef BT_REGEXP_DEBUG_LOG
6977 if (regexp_engine != BACKTRACKING_ENGINE1) { /* debugging log for NFA */
6978 FILE *f;
6979 f = fopen(BT_REGEXP_DEBUG_LOG_NAME, "a");
6980 if (f) {
6981 fprintf(f, "Syntax error in \"%s\"\n", expr);
6982 fclose(f);
6983 } else
6984 EMSG2("(NFA) Could not open \"%s\" to write !!!",emsg2((char_u *)("(NFA) Could not open \"%s\" to write !!!"),
(char_u *)(BT_REGEXP_DEBUG_LOG_NAME))
6985 BT_REGEXP_DEBUG_LOG_NAME)emsg2((char_u *)("(NFA) Could not open \"%s\" to write !!!"),
(char_u *)(BT_REGEXP_DEBUG_LOG_NAME));
6986 }
6987#endif
6988 /*
6989 * If the NFA engine failed, the backtracking engine won't work either.
6990 *
6991 if (regexp_engine == AUTOMATIC_ENGINE)
6992 prog = bt_regengine.regcomp(expr, re_flags);
6993 */
6994 }
6995
6996 return prog;
6997}
6998
6999/*
7000 * Free a compiled regexp program, returned by vim_regcomp().
7001 */
7002void vim_regfree(regprog_T *prog)
7003{
7004 if (prog != NULL((void*)0))
7005 prog->engine->regfree(prog);
7006}
7007
7008/*
7009 * Match a regexp against a string.
7010 * "rmp->regprog" is a compiled regexp as returned by vim_regcomp().
7011 * Uses curbuf for line count and 'iskeyword'.
7012 *
7013 * Return TRUE if there is a match, FALSE if not.
7014 */
7015int
7016vim_regexec (
7017 regmatch_T *rmp,
7018 char_u *line, /* string to match against */
7019 colnr_T col /* column to start looking for match */
7020)
7021{
7022 return rmp->regprog->engine->regexec_nl(rmp, line, col, false0);
7023}
7024
7025/*
7026 * Like vim_regexec(), but consider a "\n" in "line" to be a line break.
7027 */
7028int vim_regexec_nl(regmatch_T *rmp, char_u *line, colnr_T col)
7029{
7030 return rmp->regprog->engine->regexec_nl(rmp, line, col, true1);
7031}
7032
7033/*
7034 * Match a regexp against multiple lines.
7035 * "rmp->regprog" is a compiled regexp as returned by vim_regcomp().
7036 * Uses curbuf for line count and 'iskeyword'.
7037 *
7038 * Return zero if there is no match. Return number of lines contained in the
7039 * match otherwise.
7040 */
7041long vim_regexec_multi(
7042 regmmatch_T *rmp,
7043 win_T *win, /* window in which to search or NULL */
7044 buf_T *buf, /* buffer in which to search */
7045 linenr_T lnum, /* nr of line to start looking for match */
7046 colnr_T col, /* column to start looking for match */
7047 proftime_T *tm /* timeout limit or NULL */
7048)
7049{
7050 return rmp->regprog->engine->regexec_multi(rmp, win, buf, lnum, col, tm);
7051}
